Reviews.Title: great tv with some excellent features
Reviews.Author: tired of bats
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for an exercise room and hoped the speaker volume would be enough to overcome the treadmill noise. Not only was it loud enough but the tv has a setting in the sound menu called Clear Voice that emphasizes voice over sounds. This makes it much easier to understand what people are saying while on the treadmill. It also has a setting called Auto Volume that automatically adjusts the volume to the same level on all channels.  I am using the tv with a small roof top antenna and it gets all the stations from a 56 mile distance. I compared this tv's channel reception to my more expensive Toshiba Regza 46XV645U and they were both the same, so my worries of a cheap tv having an inferior tuner were over.  The base of the tv is not adjustable but was quite sturdy and level. The back has a 75mm by 75mm vesa mount so it could be mounted with something like this mount:Cheetah Mounts ALAMB Articulating Arm TV Wall Mount Bracket for VESA 100 12-24" LCD LED Flat Screen Monitors Display/TVs up to 40lbs Includes Free 10' HDMI Cable and 6" Bubble Level  I mounted this tv up high and used a feature in the picture menu called Samsung Magic Angle. This has settings to adjust the picture quality to compensate for the tv not being close to level line of sight. This brought the picture back to the same quality as if I were looking at it straight on. This feature could also be used if the tv were mounted real low.  The quality, picture, and sound of this tv were above my expectations for a tv at this price.  Update:After 1 year the tv is still going strong with no issues. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Fits on kitchen counter under the upper cabinets
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: There aren't many major brand Flat Panel TVs that will fit under the upper cabinet in your kitchen. We have 2 other Samsung TV's in the house and are very happy with them.  It was a nice surprise to find this model for our kitchen.  Its also nice to have the same remote control design in 3 rooms.  The picture is great and the sound is pretty good for the small speakers facing down from the bottom edge.A year ago we bought a 22" Visio for the kitchen.  It fit because it has no stand to increase its height.  The sound on the 22" Vizio was poor . . often hard to understand speech on some programs with the Vizio.The TV is very light weight.  To allow the TV to turn on the granite counter, I removed the sticky rubber feet and put on felt pads available at hardware stores for chair feet. The felt pads are very slippery so you can spin the TV with a finger tip.Two Minor shortcomings for our needs:1. TV has only 1 HDMI input. Our primary program source is HDMI, but with Amazon-Prime and NetFlix subscriptions we also ordered a RoKu3 module to play Amazon/NetFlix programming to this TV. It would be nice not to have to use an external HDMI switch.  (We just discovered RoKu - its the competitor to the Apple TV module, but usually considered better than Apple TV unless most of your other gadgets are also Apple)2. This TV has an external power block like your notebook computer.  On our Peninsula kitchen counter, we turn this TV to face the Kitchen or Dinette. It would be nice to not have this power block to hide.  Being compulsive about tidy electronics installations, I lengthened the low voltage power wire on the power block and placed it in the unfinished basement below the TV. Now we only have the thin black low-voltage power wire going into a wall plate along with the HDMI feed from the basement. The DishTV and Roku remote controls are both Radio-Frequency so the DishTV HDMI-module and RokU-Module can be in the basement below the TV.Overall, we are really happy to find this great TV that is only 12.5" tall with the stand.  If you really need 2 HDMI inputs and are OK with the higher price, look at the 19" Toshiba TV Toshiba 19L4200U 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV (Black)

Reviews.Title: Just average - I am keeping it, but there are pros and cons
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L. Matthews
Reviews.Content: First the cons.  The single most annoying feature of this TV is the base.  It is a cheap plastic base that does not fit properly.  It is wiggly even when fully tightened.  We had to jury rig it to get it to fit properly (snugly).  Even when tightened it leans down to the right (so the viewing from is not square, it is tilted) at a pretty noticeable angle of about an inch... To align it I propped the power cube that is part of the power cord under one end of the set and then it was even.  Should a customer have to go through this for a new product?  Definitely not.  If you intend to mount this TV on a wall or under a cabinet you will not have this problem and it is obvious that Samsung felt most would opt to do that hence not caring about the crappy fit of the base.  That being said, the base on the 19" TV, crappy as it is, is superior to the base on the 22" Samsung series 5003 TV which I returned because while that base was also plastic and flimsy (but fixable if you use your own properly fitted screws over the ones supplied in box), it also had the more serious problem of not being substantial enough to actually support the TV.  The 22" 5003 series base was too small and the TV was top heavy and very tippable.  I can't believe the designs of these bases were actually approved by Samsung.Another con, the 19" has only one HDMI port so know if you need to hook up several things you will need to buy a hub or splitter, sold separately (Amazon sells both).Also if you are planning to use this TV to receive over the air channels I was not able to find a way to manually add channels on this model.  I googled it too.  So unless there is something I am missing your over the air channels will be whatever is picked up by the TV scan only.  If you can receive most of be channels you want without adjusting your antenna then they should all be picked up on the TV scan, but if you need to adjust antenna to get certain channels it will be problematic as each scan will only pick up the channels the antenna picks up in that particular direction... And you can't manually add the channels not picked up on the scan.However, despite these issues,  I have decided to keep this TV.  I bought it for my kitchen.  If fits nicely under the upper cabinets with room to spare to sit it on cable box.  Base is small enough that it can sit on box without covering box's air vents.  Most of the smaller TVs leave something to be desired one way or the other.  The picture on the TV is excellent and it does have the traditional easy to navigate Samsung menus.  The 19" size looks better In my smaller size kitchen where the 22" still also fit under the cabinets but was a bit overpowering looking as I don't want the TV to be the focus of the room.  There are very few choices in a 19" size.  So I am keeping it because of the picture quality, compact size and ease of use of the remote to navigate menus.  Once you correct the base issues and prop it on the power cube to get the picture frame straight it actually looks pretty nice.  Plus the smaller size allows it to fit farther back into the corner, leaving more counter space for me to use when cooking.

Reviews.Title: About the stand - - -
Reviews.Author: dinkleberry
Reviews.Content: Simply put, Samsung has supplied the wrong size screws to attach the stand.  No matter how much you tighten them, there remains a gap between each screw head and the stand, causing unsafe, hazardous and frustrating wobbling of the TV all over the place.  The SIMPLE SOLUTION is to just insert a single metal washer onto each screw before inserting it into the underside of the base.  There will then be a firm and stable connection between the TV and its dedicated stand.  Samsung needs to own up to its error in supplying screws that are too long, and provide all purchasers with either three metal washers or the correct size (i.e., shorter) screws.  Also, because the screw holes are set so far into the bottom of the stand, it is advisable to use a magnetic screw driver to assist in getting the screws inside the holes.

Reviews.Title: Decent Small Television (Review of 19")
Reviews.Author: MechanicalMan
Reviews.Content: I calibrated a 19" F4000 for my father yesterday with an X-Rite Colormunki Display colorimeter. These are the settings that I settled on:Mode: MovieBacklight: 12Contrast: 100Brightness: 44Sharpness: 14Color: 50Tint: G47/R53Dynamic Contrast: OffBlack Tone: OffFlesh Tone: 0Color Space: AutoR-Offset: 24G-Offset: 23B-Offset: 23R-Gain: 34G-Gain: 32B-Gain: 30Gamma: 0Motion Lighting: OffColor Tone: Warm2Size: Screen FitDigital Clean View: OffMPEG Noise Filter: OffLED Clear Motion: OffPros+ It's inexpensive.+ Samsung appears to be the only major manufacturer producing a 19" TV at this time, so it's about the only option if you want something this small.+ The default picture settings in Movie picture mode are pretty good, so you can obtain a reasonably good image without much tinkering.+ Screen uniformity is pretty good.+ Colors appear pretty deep and saturated, in spite of the TV's unimpressive contrast ratio.Cons- Vertical viewing angles are extremely limited, so the TV only looks good from an absolutely perfect angle. Samsung includes its "Magic Angle" feature to combat this, but that is just a band-aid. Furthermore, the chintzy stand does not tilt.- On/off contrast ratio measures about 900:1, so it's clearly not in the same league as larger LCD TVs with decent VA panels.- Like most LCD displays, dark shades are heavily blue tinged. And this TV is very blue up to 15+ IRE, which is quite bad, even by cheap LCD standards.- Color accuracy is not great; for example: some shades of orange and darker flesh tones are too green, and magenta is too blue.- The speakers aren't great (obviously).- This TV has limited connectivity with no audio outputs, aside from the headphone jack.FWIW, I own an older (2010) 22" LG, and it is a significantly better TV than this Samsung. Contrast ratio is only slightly better on the LG, but its 10-point white balance controls and color management system allow for a better gamma curve and *far* better color accuracy than the F4000. Also, near-black has a more neutral color and its vertical viewing angles are significantly better (although still not good). Keep in mind, that is a discontinued model, and I have no idea how it compares to LG's current 22" models -- it's likely that they're worse. Also, LG makes nothing smaller than a 22", so it isn't an option if you want/need a 19".

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: Wonderful television. Easy to hook up and works like a charm.  I am delighted and it is a great addition to my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Eric C. Heinrich
Reviews.Content: 29-inch modelPicture and sound are fine. The sound is by no means hi-fi, but I am more concerned with hearing dialogue, and the "Clear Voice" preset works well for that. Plenty of volume. (For football games, the "Standard" preset decreases that high-pitched crowd noise.)It is true that the only audio output is an old-fashioned headphone jack (L+R).I am feeding this thing 1080i HD from DIRECTV (I pay $10 extra per month to get their HD service). Feels like I am sitting in the stadium at football games.I think the size is perfect for my small living room (12 ft. x 11 ft.) The TV sits in one corner on a 20-inch high stand with my La-Z-Boy in the opposite corner.

Reviews.Title: No audio outputs
Reviews.Author: Herb Rachac
Reviews.Content: II purchased UN29F4000 a week ago. The picture quality is great. The 26 inch RCA tv that I replaced had audio outputs. I was shocked that this one doesn't. This prevents me from connecting to a home theater system. The only audio output is for headphones. I am very disappointed that Samsung didn't supply audio outputs on this model. I would have purchased another brand if I would have known this. Even less expensive brands have audio outputs.Do to limited space I had to go with the 29 inch instead of the 32 inch model that has all needed inputs and outputs.

Reviews.Title: Great price and quality
Reviews.Author: NJ lightning "electrician"
Reviews.Content: Item shipped quickly, it is a great quality monitor with a clear picture, and price very well. it is also very lightweight, not bulky and easy to install

Reviews.Title: Fine unit for a guest bedroom
Reviews.Author: Marc O'Polo
Reviews.Content: I have rated this unit four stars only because of limited use so far. I fully expect this to be a 5-star purchase.I needed a relatively small flat-panel TV for a guest bedroom. I have a Samsung LCD in my family room and have been pleased with it. (No problems so far after five years of use.) Consumer Reports and reviews here on Amazon steered me once again to Samsung.This 29-inch model was a snap to unpack and set up. The stand is sturdy; it's held in place with self-tapping screws. I make sure to cinch down each screw as I proceed; I find this avoids problems down the road.The unit is plug-and-play. Connect it to a power outlet and a cable jack. Power it up, and it goes into an interactive guided process for setting the various parameters, including scanning for available channels.After the plug-and-play process was complete, I tweaked a couple of the settings through the menu to satisfy my preferences for screen brightness and sound quality. As with any LCD TV, sound quality leaves a lot to be desired. But I find this unit is adequate for the location in which I've placed it and the somewhat limited use it will be receiving.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a good price
Reviews.Author: Burt Bicksler
Reviews.Content: When the ancient CRT based TV in our guest room expired I was looking for a good replacement.I checked locally and no one had a good name brand smaller LED / LCD TV.  There were a few off brand models, or I could order one at a local store.This TV was at a really good price point for a Samsung.  Not much more to say.  Worked great out of the box.  Setup was very easy.Picture quality is excellent.  Sound quality is good enough for its intended purpose.  Can't say about the HDMI inputs as we don't need those at this time.I would recommend this TV if you need a smaller format model.

Reviews.Title: Great Economical Little TV
Reviews.Author: Ancient Mariner "Grandpa C."
Reviews.Content: For general home use, as we do in the kitchen, this TV provides a decent-enough picture and adequate sound for the casual or passive viewing and listening experience that it is being used for.  It is very economical to operate considering its 12-volt DC power supply.  It is very compact for use on the kitchen counter and below cabinets.  However, the only negative is that with the need to use the power adapter, plus make cable connections from the source to a digital box and then to the TV, there's a lot of cables and wiring to try and conceal when sitting on a relatively-open kitchen cabinet.  A more simplified or condensed power supply with less cords/wires would be more appealing.

Reviews.Title: perfect bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: L. Hruska
Reviews.Content: purchased for my parents, along with cheetah wall mount.works perfectly with OTA signal, great picture and acceptable sound for a tv this size.for the price, really can't ask for more.  would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Very nice set for the money!
Reviews.Author: E. Bernardino "Addicted to the Gold Box"
Reviews.Content: I received this Samsung 19-inch HDTV yesterday via next day Saturday delivery. It was purchased to replace a small, older portable set in my sunroom, that of which I finally resolved to replace after much hesitation (my motto; if it ain't broke, don't fix it!). I had opted for a Samsung, as my kitchen set is also a Samsung (albeit a costlier 19-inch model HDTV), and I have been very pleased with the performance of that set. Additionally; I own a Samsung Galaxy Tab (tablet), for which there is a "Peel" Smart Remote app that allows one to control the channels and volume of any Samsung TV. It also provides detailed program information by category which is very nice to have at your fingertips!The set is very light and easy to set up; 3 screws in the bottom to attach the fixed base, and you're good to go...simply plug the cable into the rear of the set and plug the set into an outlet. Once you turn the TV on, programming instructions will appear; use the fast start guide as a reference. The set will auto-tune your cable provider's channels (I have Verizon FIOS), and you can either manually set the color, contrast, ratio, etc. or utilize the factory preset.As the base is not extendable, I would suggest eye-level placement (the TV has an interesting "tilt" feature to compensate for non-eye level placement); I have mine set up on an attractive pedestal (which is actually a plant stand!), and that provides an ideal platform for eye-level viewing.I do wish to add that this particular TV of mine is NOT connected to High Definition broadcasting (I already have 2 HDTV sets that I utilize a bit more often than this one, and am already paying Verizon enough for those set-top boxes and their monthly service in general:), so I maintain a basic "box". Nevertheless; I am still very impressed and satisfied with the reception.I am very pleased with this set and consider it a wonderful value for the money.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME DEAL!
Reviews.Author: seniac79
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the reviews I had some doubt, but this turned out way better than I thought.  It has an awesome picture and the sound is perfect.  As long as you are looking for a 18.5 inch tv, know the base is plastic, and it has no buttons on it (there is a joystick in back that does everything, it will surprise you how great it is.

Reviews.Title: Great 29in TV!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Bennett
Reviews.Content: Supremely sharp picture - sound is not the greatest, but that may be the old channels I watch that aren't in HD also.  All in all I am very very very happy!

Reviews.Title: good value small tv
Reviews.Author: Richard Thompson
Reviews.Content: Picture is a little dark in standard mode.  The speaker is ok for small rooms.  The vewing angle feature is great if it is to be mounted above or below eye level

Reviews.Title: Good except for stand
Reviews.Author: Dianne Averill "Dianne"
Reviews.Content: Yes, all previous reviews are true. Nothing wrong with this tv except the cheap stand that's very difficult to put on.

Reviews.Title: Sound on TV is not good
Reviews.Author: Fuzzy Busey
Reviews.Content: The sound is weak and no depth.  For a kitchen TV set, it is excellent, great picture, nice fit under cabinets. The stand is really bad.  The TV set is at an angle in the stand and there is no way to get it to fit tightly or correctly.  Putting a level on the TV set shows exactly how far off it is setting. Somewhat disappointing as I have 2 other larger Samsung sets and love them.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture - big sound!
Reviews.Author: sharkychick
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these in the 19-inch size to replace the two 15-inch Toshibas I had in my kitchen and on my desk.  Our cable co is going to boxes only - no more through the wall cable, only cable through boxes starting in February.  Got the boxes and decided I needed to replace mine (although they are great little TVs) with something that has HDMI ports.So, I am extremely pleased with the picture and the sound for these TVs.  Without the HDMI it was ok, but since the cable box has HDMI (and I guess they have gone to all HD now, as long as you have the cables - woo hoo!) I figured I'd do better using that, over the a/v cables, so I got a couple of the Amazon Basics HDMI cables (great cables - I use them all over my house!) and made myself a better hook up for both of these little TVs.  It's stunning.The TV's menu has a lot of picture, sound, etc, choices.  It seems like a really good little remote, so I'm kind of sad I have to use those big, clunky, Charter remotes.Fortunately, I read several reviews and one thing that seemed to be apparent was that attaching the stand could be problematic.  I did what one reviewer recommended and screwed the screws into the television first.  Then  I took them out and attached the stand, screwing it in.  Having done that it was pretty easy.  I did it on my own, without anybody else to help.  I've attached the stands for all the TVs in my house, so I was fairly familiar with the process.  I just lay the TV, face down, on a soft towel on my dining room table - with the bottom end at the edge of the table.  That makes it pretty easy to get the stand on.  Then I get one of the screws in about three quarters of the way so that I have stability and then do the rest, and tighten everything up.So, the reason I gave it only four stars is that the stand for this TV is slightly sub-standard.  The stands on my 15-inch Toshibas were way wider and more stable.  I'd be sure that this TV is not where kids or animals can access it because I feel like you could knock it over with a feather.  It's not a deal-breaker because it will be ok but I wish the stand were wider.

Reviews.Title: Much better than earlier models...
Reviews.Author: Grant Holle
Reviews.Content: I had a Samsung 19" LCD that was about 2 years old and it NEVER had very good sound.  There was no way to attach a sound bar or anything since it didn't even have a headphone jack.  Since my hearing is not that good, I had enough.  I looked at options to replace the kitchen TV and came back to Samsung again after reading other reviews.To say the least, the sound is much better with a "clear voice" option that works.  The picture seems clearer too with a better ability to retrieve public channels from an antenna source.The one downside is the inability to lock in favorite channels and skip the rest.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: We think it is GREAT.  (I tried to punch all the stars, but I couldn't get them to enter.) This was a Christmas present for my 47 year old daughter and she really likes it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung quality
Reviews.Author: NikTesla
Reviews.Content: This was actually bought for someone else, but she's been raving about it ever since it arrived... lol.  I checked it out myself the next time I was over there, and I was very impressed myself.  The TV seems to be a very good product for the money... not surprising, considering it's made by Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for my purposes
Reviews.Author: dz
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a replacement/updated monitor for my laptop with the added benefit of over the air TV. Connected my powered speakers to headphone jack on TV and I only needed one cable from my laptop to TV and the television works beautifully and when I source it to my laptop it displays my desktop beautifully as well. This TV exceeded my expectations for my application

Reviews.Title: Terrific 29" TV
Reviews.Author: Jane Varn "Crime Aficionado"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great telephone assistance for setting it up.  And, the only smaller LED HDTV I've seen that doesn't distort image.If you have a smaller space than 32" this is the perfect television for everyday use.  Doesn't need to be confined to the bedroom.Up until Samsung came out with the 29" we were stuck with 26" or smaller.  I had purchased a 26" earlier, but it was awful, so returned it.  Finally, my old 19" TV gave up the ghost--loss of color, loss of sound, and I was forced to buy a new set.Couldn't be happier with my purchase.  Kudos to Samsung and Amazon.  Received it even before expected date and set was not too difficult to install (with a little help from my son).

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: W. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Awesome little TV that I use in my kitchen.  I love everything except that it only has no buttons to control channels, volume, no/off.  Instead, it has a joystick in the back of the TV (lower left corner).  You have to push it to bring up a menu and then move it in one of four directions to do what you want using the pop up menu on the screen.  Would be much more convenient if it had simply buttons on the front like most TVs.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: paulicious21
Reviews.Content: Its an awesome TV! Perfect for our entertainment center. We needed a new TV and were not looking into getting rid of our entertainment center. This TV was just big enough to fit. The picture is beautiful. I don't know what 1080p looks like but coming from an old tube TV I probably wouldn't know the difference. My only complaint is that it doesn't have an audio out. But considering the limitations we had this was the best there is. I would recommend this product if you don't care about the audio out. It does have a mini headphone jack.

Reviews.Title: Pictuer and sound were excellant but many features specified in product description were missing.
Reviews.Author: hans w lange
Reviews.Content: 1 The picture quality and sound system were. excellent, the remote controls were intuitive to use.2 Instruction manual wasn't supplied and not available as a  down load3 Headphone plug wouldn't accept standard miniature jack.4 The HDMI connector was the only audio video input but the composite  audio video connection and shared composite specified in the description were missing

Reviews.Title: Great quality and price!
Reviews.Author: Dwayne S. Daughtry
Reviews.Content: my mom wanted a TV in her bedroom. I looked for a few weeks around stores but didn't seem to find the right one. My mom is older and does NOT like new technology because it seems confusing. I cannot blame her way of thinking.The initial setup was all too easy. In fact, the TV does it all for you. Even puts the name of the TV station in the channel selector for you. No more manually entering TV call station identifiers.The picture screen is actually very impressive for 720p. Small and light enough to set on a wooden dresser without fear of imprints on the finish. Very good sound quality. Remote is simple for any age. I highly recommend for the price and quality.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Never a problem with Samsung TVs. Easy setup, good picture quality, good sound quality. changing channels could be a bit faster, but no complaints. Just don't buy a Toshiba!!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Hilary O'Gorman
Reviews.Content: I like this TV very much.  It has a very clear picture. It meets my expectations.I would recommend this TV to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV Replacement
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Had to get rid of the last analog TV in my house which was a 19" old square one. 4:3 channels are a bit smaller but 16:9 really fills up the screen. I don't need full hi def at this size, neither should you. Small amount of setup was needed to deactivate a sound that indicated turning on and off of the tv (new feature that NO ONE will like). Other than that it's a great Samsung product as usual. Easy to use remote lights up with CC and Sleep 1 button away. Great Bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, perfect for my Kitchen. It is mounted under a cabinet. I am a little disappointed with my mount I purchased but TV is great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV!
Reviews.Author: E. Anne Withrow "Maxanne"
Reviews.Content: We really love this Samsung. I bought it for  my kitchen counter. I was so surprised at first how small....however it fits under my cupboards perfectly with room to spare. The picture is great and the sound good. Very happy with the great price and fast shipping with Prime.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: GC
Reviews.Content: Bought this from the Amazon Warehouse. It did not look quite like the set pictured. The frame around the screen on the one I received is much thicker than the photo from Amazon. Picture is good, sound is very good and the remote responds great. We use this on a bracket in the kitchen. It sits on the supplied base which was not a problem to set up except Amazon forgot to send the screws to do so. Luckily I had some that worked perfectly. There was some wear on the face of the frame that made it clear that this was not a new TV. Some careful polishing with some compound paste brought it back to looking new. The wear scratches may have been the result of improper repackaging.

Reviews.Title: Decent Buy
Reviews.Author: Mark T Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Overall this HDTV is decent but not great.  Picture quality is good.  There are no buttons on the unit itself so everything must be done with the remote.  Not a big deal but everyone should be aware.  Also, the viewing angle is not great on this unit so if viewing at an off be aware the picture quality diminishes quite a bit.  Using in a bedroom so sound quality was not that important as most viewing is done with low volume anyway.  Sounds okay for a small 29-inch TV.  This is a decent buy if looking for a small room TV with good picture and a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Matches my professional monitor
Reviews.Author: R. Kent McVety
Reviews.Content: I run video in our church, and while we have expensive equipment, the monitor in the control booth is poor quality.  It is difficult to tell if the camera exposure is correct using this poor quality TV.  When I play recordings at home afterward, the picture looks different from when viewing it live.  I was looking for a TV to use as a monitor that would match the picture on my JVC professional CRT monitor.  I spent several hours adjusting the settings, and finally got a very close match to my professional monitor.  The factory settings look awful, so adjustments are necessary to get a really good picture.  Like other reviews, I found the stand to be flimsy, and difficult to get the screws tight enough.  By doing some hard turning of the screw driver, I was able to get the stand tightly fastened. The stand has a nice glossy finish, but is not as strong as the one on my older Samsung TV.  It seems that as the TVs become lighter in weight, the stands are also lighter.  Here are the settings I used.  They worked for me.  The TV was on a small table that was slightly lower than my line of sight.  My settings were based upon this angle..Mode:  StandardMagic Angle : Standing ModeBack Light : 20Contrast : 95Brightness : 52 (for component and HDMI, 65 for composite)Sharpness : 50Color : 40 (for component, 38 for HDMI, 44 for composite)Tint : (G/R)  G40/R60Dynamic Contract : OffBlack Tone : OffFlesh Tone : -2Color Space : NativeWhite Balance : No changeGamma : 0Motion Lighting : OffColor Tone : StandardSize: 4:3 (using TV for SD video)Digital Clean View : OffMPEG Noise Filter : AutoLED Clear Motion : OffHDMI Black Level : Normal (works only for adjusting HDMI mode)I found the Magic Angle to be a big help.  With this turned off, the picture looked washed out.  These settings did work for me. However, they may not be ideal for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect choice for RV
Reviews.Author: Brent L. Portschy
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture. Very bright colors. Excellent sound. I have it mounted in a swivel mount in my truck camper. Works well for this. Easy to program for Chanel search. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great for college dorm room or kitchen
Reviews.Author: TMM "JOTA"
Reviews.Content: TV is perfect for college dorm room or kitchen. Crisp picture and great sound for the size! Inexpensive is also a selling point.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and the best quality for my bedroom!
Reviews.Author: nature99
Reviews.Content: The 29" is just perfect for my bedroom. The picture quality (I use the movie mode) and the sound is excellent. Definitely worth the price. The refresh rate is the best I've seen. I have other smart TV from ViewSonic, but there is no comparison. I'll only look for Samsung when shopping for another TV.One minor complaint:  The on/off tune is too loud and annoying (especially at night time) in my opinion.  I wonder if there is a way to turn that off or lower the volume. (See the note below.)Edited (May 2014):  I just realized that there IS a menu funtion to control the on/off melody volume.  Also, now I use the standard picture mode (instead of movie mode) to save energy and the picture quality is as good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my bedroom corner wall mount
Reviews.Author: Randy "rschamberg2"
Reviews.Content: I needed an LED TV to replace my aged (1997)  27" table mounted TV because of space limitations.  This TV fit perfectly up in the corner between a closet and a window.  The TV was easy to set up and the picture quality is great. I bought this TV because I am a long-time Samsung user and I have been very pleased with all the Samsung products I have (cameras, refrigerator, mp4 player, etc).

Reviews.Title: fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Donna M.
Reviews.Content: well packed; very fast delivery; easy to assemble; Samsung is always an excellent TV--we have 3 others; have used it a few weeks now and couldn't be better

Reviews.Title: Sweet little tv
Reviews.Author: Suzzz
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my kitchen, storm cellar and camper. Very light weight and cute. Great picture and good sound (has jacks for speakers for picky people). I'll get a case for it for use in the camper.

Reviews.Title: Great tuner
Reviews.Author: J. Rossi "Jim Rossi"
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for a TV this size for years, but was reluctant to buy because of the differences in tuners.  I watch "over the air" broadcasts and do not pay for CATV.  Finally discovered the Samsung tuner was very good.  Can pull in about 60 free channels from the Chicago area using an antenna in my attic.

Reviews.Title: Woulda, Shoulda, Coulda...
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Crane
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 19 inch LED HDTV would have been 5 stars if the stand that attaches to it was actually made right. It was super wobbly and if you look closely 3, count em, 3 washers (plastic molding) should be on the stand. My stand only had 1 molded onto the stand and the 2 other holes for the screws were missing the plastic molded washer. If you're getting something for your kitchen this would be your best bet, but ONLY if its going to be attached to the wall. The stand sucks! Beware of the stand!!!! Samsung should fix this but they won't... sad but true

Reviews.Title: nice tv for specific use
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and a wall mount bracket for mounting in kitchen under cabinet.  Pros - Its a nice compact and lightweight TV, good for such an application and easy to mount.  The only con for me, due to where/how I was mounting it, is the power cord.  This TV has a DC power converter similar to what a laptop computer has so there is a cable from the wall to the converter and a thin wire from the converter to the TV.  Even though the converter is no bigger than my hand, it does make it a little cumbersome and difficult to hide all the wires.  Like I said though, this was a con for me due to my application - I'm sure others might not see this as a con.

Reviews.Title: Died after a few weeks
Reviews.Author: J. Arnold "jim18170"
Reviews.Content: The TV started cycling when turned on and would not display a picture. I liked the ability to play avi and .mov files on it so I'm getting a replacement unit and hope this one is not a lemon. Will try and report back in a few months on the replacement unit.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: K. T. Poo
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom; fortunately,  I had no assembly problems; the picture is great and the sound is fine. The only issue I would mention is the Windows-like chime when the unit  powers off and on, something I would eliminate if I could.

Reviews.Title: Color quality not great.
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: This TV is OK. Good sound. But the color is just kind of off and I can't get it to look great after lots of adjustments.Also, there is NO AUDIO INPUT which was a giant disappointment

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Tonnie
Reviews.Content: Although it arrived three days late. I am very happy with the quality of this TV. The instructions on set up were clear and all necessary wiring was included.

Reviews.Title: Crystal Clear!
Reviews.Author: Bart O'Brien
Reviews.Content: My Grandmother loves her new television, it's small enough for her room and the picture is clear as a bell. She said "This is the best thing since color TV", enough said!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase, but some parts were missing!!
Reviews.Author: Graeme  Hyslop
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived with a previously opened package. On receipt of the package, there was one battery included for the controller, however, I did have another new battery. Theeere were no screws included (3 were required to secure the stand to the TV. There was a phone number included with the instructions to contact Samsung and I spoke to them and got a number to call Samsung's parts supplier and  pay for those screws (not available in stores). They arrived two days later, and were fitted. Hooked up the TV and it works really well; picture excellent; sound, metallic so-so.

Reviews.Title: Kids room
Reviews.Author: david m joseph
Reviews.Content: I brought this TV for the kids room. Easy to setup and it's has simple functions that the kids can grasp. It's is very light so if you wanted to put on a high self, you won't be breaking your back, picking it up.

Reviews.Title: great little TV
Reviews.Author: sarah brown
Reviews.Content: Great little kitchen TV- got a nice bluray player with it- works perfectly- good color and quality- excellent buy for the price - highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Good Little TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Rademacher
Reviews.Content: For a tiny little TV, it has great picture and sound. It would be pretty small for a large living room or kitchen. But, it's perfect for a bed room or college dorm room. Don't regret buying it at all.

Reviews.Title: Best TV in it's class
Reviews.Author: Geneco
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV.  Great sound and perfect picture.  If you are looking for a TV for a small room, this is it.

Reviews.Title: not quite up to expectations
Reviews.Author: Marcia M. Zuber
Reviews.Content: The picture is great and for that alone I would give it five stars. I can't get it to patch into my stereo system, so I am forced to use the built in speakers, which are about average for a TV set. I had my ten year old set linked in to my stereo and to that extent it is a disappointment. Other than this I would recommend the set.

Reviews.Title: on off switch
Reviews.Author: JP "jpr"
Reviews.Content: It does not have a on off switch and it should have .  You have to turn it on and off with the remote.  It would be nice if it had a way to turn it off and on with out having to  using the remote.  Other wise it works just great

Reviews.Title: Just the right size for a kitchen.
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Martin "Plumb Cheap"
Reviews.Content: Just got this from Amazon a few days ago. Nice picture and audio is good. There are not that many choices for 19" models. I think this one is probably as good as it gets.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: traben
Reviews.Content: Great little tv.  I have a small bathroom and wanted a tv in it. This is perfect .. can't beat the Samsung picture

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: leslie durso
Reviews.Content: The size is what I wanted and the picture is great .  This is the first Samsung but I will defineately consider the brand again when I need another

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Jaco
Reviews.Content: Good: Price, Amazon 2-day shipping, very low power consumption, easy programming, lighted remote, very lightweight, fast volume adjustments.Not so Good: Picture (it is fine for some, but not a fan of LED technology), sound (literally sounds like the cheapest of cheap speakers ever made)Overall: Good purchase. I bought a pair of computer speakers and hooked it up to the 1/8" earphone/audio jack. Problem solved. Since it is a kitchen TV...not too concerned about perfect picture quality. Put a Wattmeter on the outlet to see how much power is being consumed by the TV and speakers...18 watts. Pretty darn good!

Reviews.Title: Gift to myself
Reviews.Author: Jo
Reviews.Content: This met my greatest expectations.  Great picture, sound and easy to program. Perfect for my viewing in the kitchen.  Good choice.

Reviews.Title: A great little TV
Reviews.Author: L. Hanson
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace an old 15 inch CRT TV in my home office, and this Samsung 19 inch is terrific.  Great picture quality, slim frame, responsive and intuitive remote.  The only thing preventing a 5-star rating is sound quality, which is typical for small flat screen TV's.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size, surprising quality for a small TV
Reviews.Author: Freedom
Reviews.Content: Works great in my kitchen. Liked it so much we bought a second one for one of our son's rooms.

Reviews.Title: just what I needed
Reviews.Author: careful shopper
Reviews.Content: I looked for a small TV for the kitchen. The picture is clear, and the sound is good. With rabbit ears I can get all my local stations.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: dudeawesome everything i expected and more...i actually expected it was going alright but its really good for gaming or what not

Reviews.Title: Nice small TV for kitchen counter or desktop
Reviews.Author: Ranger "Happy Retiree"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and program.  I'm very happy with it.  Excellent picture quality.  I think anything Samsung is excellent.  Have a Samung camera that is awesome, taking pictures and videos.  There is one little annoyance.  When turning the TV on or off, there is a little musical sound, sort of like when Windows starts on a computer.  Perhaps there is a way to turn it off that I don't know about.  Never-the-less, a five star product.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, BUT power kept cycling off & on.
Reviews.Author: John Whattam
Reviews.Content: This was just  the size that I needed & the picture was great.Had to return it because  power kept cycling off & on.It was a refurbish so maybe it had happened in an earlier life.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Is it So who knows "Opinion Oky"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is good and the volume and audio is excellent. What stinks is the stand it comes with. I'm using the stand but have bought a wall mounting bracket.  Whats with the stand?

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: blondie
Reviews.Content: I needed a new TV for my sewing room and this just fit the bill perfectly. It has a beautiful picture and I love it. Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the guest room--and at a great price
Reviews.Author: John Grissim
Reviews.Content: We shopped carefully before deciding on this used model (fulfilled by Amazon) for $135 (a $20 savings) for our guest room. It appears Samsung is the only major HDTV manufacturer still making a 19" model, and the size is perfect (and weighs only a few pounds). An excellent picture, crisp and bright, decent sound, and quite robust for the money, e.g., two HDMI inputs, a USB port, cable and RCA jacks, an earphone jack. A few reviews complained (correctly) that the three screws used to attach the stand are a trifle too long, resulting in a wobbly (and frustrating) fit that caused them to return the merchandise. I followed a reviewers advice that the problem is easily fixed by adding a small washer to each screw. Voila! Nice and snug. Another plus for Samsung is this model has an excellent onscreen interface for making all kinds of adjustments to sound, picture, aspect, and viewing angle. It's worth the time to run through the settings and options to get everything just right, then you're good to go. Highest recommendation, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: KSch
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase for a good price. The setup was easy. Unlike other reviews that criticized the stand and sound, I found the stand to be easily assembled and fairly sturdy and I am pleased with the sound. The picture is great and it is great in our kitchen. I have been using the television for about a month now. I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jose silva
Reviews.Content: some difficulty in adapting the signal but only at first, a complete menu with multiple functions, good connectivity, good picture and sound excellent. I highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound for small space
Reviews.Author: Maddakat
Reviews.Content: I needed sets for my kitchen and a small family room.  These are perfect.  The picture is clear and the sound is good.  The set up was fast and easy.  Great little set at a bargain price.

Reviews.Title: Bangarang
Reviews.Author: Brian Daukulis
Reviews.Content: I use this tv for video games in my bedroom.  The picture looks great for its small size.  Plenty of options to help customize the output.  Comes with a plastic stand that doesn't fit too snug so make sure to keep it on a secure surface.

Reviews.Title: TV great, except for minor adjustments
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Pat Englert
Reviews.Content: It may be because of my advanced years, but I had to get a sound bar to hear the TV perfectly.  Then, I got a universal remote to avoid the four I was using.  That is why I gave the TV 4 stars instead of 5, because I am well=pleased with the picture and the TV. in general.

Reviews.Title: Great for the kitchen countertop!
Reviews.Author: melodie olson
Reviews.Content: This T.V. Came well packed, on time, and easy to set up. It fits very well on a narrow countertop. Great value.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV's
Reviews.Author: Thomas Stansbury
Reviews.Content: Great TV's ! Have 5 and have had no problems with any ! Easy to hook up and get into use !

Reviews.Title: small TV
Reviews.Author: Dennis Nofsinger
Reviews.Content: Excellent coice for the right spot on the kitchen counter.Very good picture and sound. Blends in nicely with the black granite top.

Reviews.Title: great value for the money. Im thinking about buying a second for the bedroom.
Reviews.Author: Stephen White
Reviews.Content: good quality picture, good sound and a good price tag. Going to buy another one for the bedroom. This one is in the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: a really good buy
Reviews.Author: Olympic Peninsula Grandma "PSPlayer"
Reviews.Content: This replaced an ancient tv in my bedroom. The old one was so heavy I had trouble lifting it. This one weighed around 8 lbs. What a difference! It's light, and really easy to set up. All of the tweaks can be done with the remote control but to tell you the truth, all I had to do was plug it into my cable, and into the power outlet and I was good to go. I will need to replace my living room tv soon and I am definitely going to go with Samsung, very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Traci Mastroianni
Reviews.Content: Purchased dvd and tv separately because of bad reviews of the combos...For my sons college Dorm...its not a huge tv, definately a personal tv, may be worth paying the few extra dollars for the next size up - but it is what it is and it came fast as always ...I love Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kitchen
Reviews.Author: Ron N
Reviews.Content: Great little TV for kitchen.  Seems very high quality, extremely light and unobtrusive.  Perfect for kitchen use.  Haven'y used it too much yet.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Anne K.
Reviews.Content: We got this TV to replace a 22-inch which was too small for our family room.  (We don't like rooms to be dominated by the TV - but there are limits).  This one seems perfect so far; easy to set up and great picture.  The only drawback is that we have to use the Comcast Infinity remote to change channels, and it's a pain to keep track of two remotes.  Maybe there is a way to get around this that we haven't discovered yet?

Reviews.Title: If you want a small flatscreen LED TV, this is great!
Reviews.Author: RAF
Reviews.Content: Excellent HD picture for our kitchen counter.  Although not quite as clear as the much larger 32 and 40 inch LED's elsewhere in the house, this works well under our kitchen cabinets.

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: Aldo Garbellini
Reviews.Content: There is a jack for connecting earphones, and I have connected external speakers which produced a very inferior sound.  I connected my very high quality speakers to the TV, and it still had a very poor sound.  The refresh rate should have been higher, but I use it daily, and I am generally pleased with the video.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful in every way!
Reviews.Author: Kenton Lynne
Reviews.Content: We now have three Samsung TVs and and they are all great.  This one was bought to replace an old tube type TV that my wife had in the kitchen and is almost constantly on -- at least when she's anywhere near the kitchen.  The energy efficiency of this LED TV (average yearly electrical cost = $3) over the old tube TV will probably pay for the TV itself in a few years!  I mounted it (B00CO72X6G under the kitchen cabinet to save counter space and now it can easily be positioned to be viewed anywhere in the area.  It has decent sound, a wonderful picture, was easy to set up and even has a powered USB port so my wife can plug in her digital picture frame along side it.  Can't think of a single thing to complain about so: 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19F4000 19-Inch 720p 60Hz Slim LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: SCARLATTI
Reviews.Content: YES!  IT IS A SMALL T. V THAT HAD TO FIT INTO A BOOKCASE SHELL IN THE BREAKFAST ROOM.YES, IT  FIT.YES IT IS A VERY GOOD LITTLE T.V.!

Reviews.Title: Goodshopper
Reviews.Author: good shopper
Reviews.Content: We love this little TV. As a matter of fact, I purchased two of them- one for my kitchen and one for my laundry room- and they are perfect! Great size, sound and picture!!

Reviews.Title: Angle viewing is terrible
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: If you're looking at picture directly from the front it is a beautiful picture. However, when viewing at the slightest angle the picture starts to look grey, white and hazy and gets worst as you're angle increases. I would not recommend this TV unless you plan to watch it straight on.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and sound but:
Reviews.Author: Bruce E.
Reviews.Content: Everything about it is good except the fact the stand is fixed. Because it is small one has to assume it will be placed in a standing work place area, such as a kitchen counter. My wife, even at only 5' has to put a wedge under the front of the stand in order for the picture to look good.  For me to have good viewing, I would have to put a wedge so thick the the TV would fall over backwards.

Reviews.Title: A pretty good HDTV for Blu-Ray, PS3, 360, and PC gaming.
Reviews.Author: G. Pineda
Reviews.Content: I don't really watch TV so I can't really say how cable or antennae looks but I do watch allot of Blu-Ray Movies/TV Shows and play allot of Video Games.I needed a new TV for my small apartment since my old 26" Sony finally bit the dust and I decided to go with Samsung this time around. Was looking at the 32" TVs but they all seem rather Large coming from my old 26" TV. I finally saw the 29" Samsung and tested it out at the store and it seemed the perfect picture and size for what I needed it for.I couldn't try my Consoles or my Gaming PC but luckily I had my Laptop with me and I was able to test it out via HDMI. Obviously you're not gonna get a 1080p picture quality out of this TV but at 1366x768 my games and movies looked pretty darn good.I finally received my new Samsung from Amazon and my PS3 and 360 both look great on this TV. I also tried my Blu-Ray player and the movies seemed to be way more vibrant then on my old Sony which is a huge plus for me.Suffice it to say, I'm quite happy with this purchase over all. It would of been cool to get a 1080p TV but since I had a size constraint I'm perfectly happy with what I got. Besides, at 28.5" which is what the size actually is, 1366x768 is more then sufficient.

Reviews.Title: Best choice where a TV this size makes sense
Reviews.Author: J. Holman
Reviews.Content: It's hard to find a small TV with decent picture quality, and this 19 inch Samsung is about as good as it gets in that respect. I bought it mainly to use while walking on my treadmill, where I'm looking at the screen from a couple of feet back. I'd actually have preferred a 15 or 16 inch TV for this purpose, and I also own a current model, 16 inch Viewsonic that I could have used. But the Samsung's picture is way better; the Viewsonic is washed out by comparison, and if you're not directly in front of the Viewsonic, it gets worse. This seems to be a problem with 15-16 inch TVs in general, based on other reviews on Amazon. Off axis viewing is better, if not ideal, on the 19 inch Samsung. So I can also watch it from across the room when I'm not on my treadmill, as long as the viewing angle isn't too extreme. (Side viewing is better than looking up at it, which makes the picture go dark -- so if you plan to mount the Samsung on wall, get a mount that's easy to tilt).I'm also pleased that the controls and user interface seem logical and straightforward -- though that could be because I own a couple of other Samsung TVs.The sound is about what you'd expect from a TV this size: acceptable, and certainly better than the 15-16 inch models deliver. But most of the time, I'm using the Samsung to watch something off my Roku box, with the sound connected from the Roku to an audio system. The Samsung also offers more in and outs than most small TVs, so there are a variety of connection possibilities.To sum things up: There are a lot of places where a TV this size is the ideal choice, and among the rather few offerings available, this Samsung stands out.On my wish list: I wouldn't have minded paying an extra $50 or so if Samsung had managed to include some "Smart TV" features, at least Netflix, Pandora, etc. But it appears Samsung doesn't offer these features on any TV smaller than 32 inches. That's a shame, because if you think about it, the places where you'd want a small TV (kitchens? bathrooms?) are probably the very places where you don't want several pieces of equipment and a tangle of cables. Even though the Roku interface is better than the comparatively sluggish "Smart TV" features on one of my larger Samsung sets, I'd have rather not had to dangle the extra cables off my treadmill to connect a Roku box. A smaller TV with Netflix -- and wifi -- would make perfect sense. Are you listening, Samsung? (Vizio makes one, though admittedly, it's 24 inches -- I might have bought it if it were smaller.)

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Rosalee A. Morrow
Reviews.Content: This couldn't have been more perfect if it had been custom made! Great picture. Perfect fit for kitchen. Packed to perfection with everything I needed included. Beautiful. Great price also. Thank you Amazon.com!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Must view from directly in front in order to get fairly decent picture
Reviews.Author: Robert Girr
Reviews.Content: The TV is used in the bedroom.  You must change a viewing angle setting to view the TV from level, standing, or from the floor.  This is inconvenient when you are moving about.  Nowhere as good a picture as our Sonys'.

Reviews.Title: Small, but just right
Reviews.Author: S. Bruce
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for the corner of our kitchen counter. Easy install and great picture. Sound is just OK, but that's not unexpected for the built-in speakers, especially for a guy who has surround sound in three rooms of the house (just no there with the kitchen, yet). This is our third Samsung TV and we have yet to be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV with DVD
Reviews.Author: Beverly Bricker
Reviews.Content: This is so slim and takes of next to no room plus it has the DVD included right in the rear of the screen. Very compact and great picture. The only possible complaint I might have would be in their documentation. They put numbers of what each button would do but very hard to follow since the number and item description are on one page and the pictures are on another and there are no numbers on the remote or other items.  The remote is the worst because there are a lot of buttons on that one item alone. Other than having a little trouble finding out which is which. Otherwise it really makes me happy that I purchased it. (I will learn the placements over time).

Reviews.Title: best in 29" class?
Reviews.Author: Aaron M. Graeff
Reviews.Content: Great picture, best I have seen in this size after much research.  Sound quality is good for a flat panel TV.

Reviews.Title: Great value, Great TV
Reviews.Author: Nathan T. Smith "Comman1"
Reviews.Content: vivid picture. Replaced a 13 inch television we had in our kitchen. The viewing area is actually 5 inches larger and the overall footprint of the TV is smaller. This is my second Samsung TV in my home. I have 2 other HD televisions and they both have more features and higher resolution. Both the Samsung televisions have better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Sarah H.
Reviews.Content: the quality of the picture is excellent! You have the ability to change the setting of the picture for which media you are viewing: i.e.-movies, games, standard... Glad we purchased this set!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jpp
Reviews.Content: Great Tv,great picture, great sound, easy hook up and prefect for small room, kitchen. I love it It It It.

Reviews.Title: Flat Screen Finally
Reviews.Author: Carol Plaza
Reviews.Content: Put it off as my old t.v. was working just fine. Received as present and LOVE IT!. Clear, beautiful picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: James P. Hanson
Reviews.Content: This  is  a great TV.  It  is relatively low cost.  It  has  a great picture and sound.  It  was  easy to set  up.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19-inch Flatscreen...
Reviews.Author: K. Hughes
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a small bedroom- it is sitting on an antique decorative wall shelf, rather than mounted to the wall.  Samsung is one of my personal favorites in most tech- and on this TV, the excellence is no exception.  INCREDible picture right out of the box.  It was simple as pie to hook up to my comcast box (they did a little tweak with the box from their end).  For a small TV, the clarity is amazing and the sound really surprised me.  In all, I am totally delighted and would recommend this great little unobtrusive TV to anyone who has space limitations.  I have a HUGE Samsung flatscreen in the living room and this one is just perfect for a small bedroom!  GREAT price and good product.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV for the kitchen or extra bed room
Reviews.Author: Karl Carpenter
Reviews.Content: The Good:Picture quality is what I expected, though black seemed a hair on the grey side. Colors were good. Vibrant and Bright.Sound Quality was more than acceptable.A lot of people have complained about the stand not being sturdy. I did not have that problem, though getting the screws in correctly could be a little difficult if your screw driver is not magnetic. The slot for them is deep and I couldn't get my fingers in them to get them started.Could be better:Power On time is a little slower than I would like ~10 seconds to get a picture.I don't really like the "joy stick" style control on the back of the TV, it feels awkward to me.Only one HDMI port - Yes I am aware this is listed but they could have put just one more in.All in All:Yeah, I'd buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tv
Reviews.Author: Patrick Harris
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and great picture with total ease of operation. Fits perfectly under our cabinets. Would buy this again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound.
Reviews.Author: D. Navarre
Reviews.Content: I bought this for one of my work rooms. It sets on a shelf above the work bench. Since the stand is not adjustable, the TV has an option on the menu to choose a "Lean Back" setting that adjust the viewing angle so you can get a good picture even viewing from below the TV. It also has a "Standing" option.I'm just hooked up to a cable so I can't comment on any of the other input features.Cons:I do wish it had a "Favorites" button on the remote to let you advance through your favorite channels. To view your favorite channels you have to go through menu options each time.There is supposed to be an option for the TV to adjust the brightness automatically based on the light in the room but for some reason I can't activate that feature. The option is gray, non-selectable.

Reviews.Title: perfect size for a bedroom bookcase!
Reviews.Author: mary anne
Reviews.Content: i needed a narrow size tv for my guest room bookshelf, and this was theperfect one.  i actually could have bought it from my local box store but they couldn'tgive me exact details about the dimensions... none on display, just in boxes.amazon gave me the dimensions and i ordered and had it in plenty of time.picture is good!

Reviews.Title: Ordered for Mama's kitchen
Reviews.Author: Diane Miller "Two Star Blue Star"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this and it was delivered very fast. A friend opened it up and attached it for her. When I went to visit we took the old one to recycle and sure appreciated this small flat screen. It turned out to be exactly what she needed on her kitchen table. I picked this especially because of the audio option to enhance voice, and she has some hearing loss, to this is good for what she watches. Plus it is lightweight enough that she can easily move it around for the angle, or the light coming in the window.

Reviews.Title: There is no better kitchen TV out there (that I could find)
Reviews.Author: SomeGuy
Reviews.Content: For the kitchen, this is the best TV I could find. They don't make many TV's under 19". The TV's that are available, everyone complains about the viewing angle and bad sound quality on ALL of them. Is this the best TV ever? NO. However, the viewing angle and the sound are of reasonable/expected quality. You WON'T (IMHO) find a better comparable/similar TV anywhere. It's light weight and small. I have a large high $ samsung in my living room, and this one sort of reminds me of it's little brother. It's kinda the same, but it's scaled back. Lower quality and less options. For my kitchen it's a GREAT TV! My guess is that it would make a great TV for a kid's room, an exercise room, the laundry room, and etc. as well. The stand is a little flimsy, sure, but it's fine. You (hope you) get what you pay for, and this TV is the quality you would expect at this price. I wish it had a PC hookup to use it as a monitor, but it doesn't... Otherwise I have NO complaints about this TV. ...nuff said.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Television
Reviews.Author: shelley harari
Reviews.Content: This tv was exactly what I was looking for. I needed a small tv for a summer house bedroom. It serves its purpose. The picture is clear and the sound is fine. I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted. Base attachment aside.
Reviews.Author: John Curtis "jgcurtis"
Reviews.Content: I haven't checked out anything beyond HDMI input mode. Setup easy and has the right bells and whistles including "Clear Voice".Attachment of base difficult without a holding Philips driver of the correct size. I had to tighten the three base screws to the point where the drive X felt nearly stripped. Until really tightened, base was floppy and unsuitable.I never could find Samsung model to program DirecTv remote for TV volume, etc. Anyone know how to do it?Very nice picture, sound acceptable for this size TV.

Reviews.Title: Great value for small tv
Reviews.Author: Seattleite
Reviews.Content: We're using this in our kitchen and it is great for this purpose.  It is low enough to fit under cabinets but screen is large enough to watch from across the room and sound quality  is very good.  Lots of controls for picture settings, picture quality is also very good.  It was harder than expected to screw the base to the TV but once the screws are firmly seated the stand is sturdy enough.  No regrets on this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Really Great little tv!
Reviews.Author: Barbara lynch
Reviews.Content: I just got my Samsung 19" Led TV about 4 days ago or so and it is working just fine.  The picture quality is excellent and adjustable and the sound can be adjusted to suit your tastes.  I am very glad that I bought this Samsung 19" goes well next to my bed hooked up to a dvd player.  It is a great little extra TV.

Reviews.Title: The perfect TV for the Kitchen
Reviews.Author: RickRed
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for Mothers day to replace an aging CRT TV. I used an under the cabinet mount and it freed up a ton of space on their kitchen counter top. The included base for the  the TV is removable, so it looks like the TV is just floating under the cabinet.The TV has a  nice picture and a very wide viewing angle. The TV arrived a few days earlier than predicted, which was a good thing, considering I ordered a little too close to Mothers day. I'm not sure where the speakers are, but their is plenty of sound. I am very satisfied with the TV. Mom and Dad like it too!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Slim LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Julie J. Fadoir
Reviews.Content: This TV is very fun to play with all the functions!  And there are many changes that you can make to the picture -- size, colors, etc.  The picture is very clear, but the screen a little small. If I were to purchase another, it would be a larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Karen Byers
Reviews.Content: I really like the tv....easy to set up....quick delivery....perfect for kid's room.  Would recommend if you need a small tv.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Julian A. Mack
Reviews.Content: Good little TV.  Picture is clear, sound is good. No complaints at all.  Would have no compunction about recommending this model to anyone seeking a small TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19 inch TV
Reviews.Author: priscilla b. wardlaw
Reviews.Content: I use this TV in my bedroom. It's compact size fits perfectly on my dresser and the picture is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size TV for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: This TV is the perfect size for the kitchen counter.  It replaced a tube TV that took up too much space on the counter.  Great picture quality as always.  I now have 3 various model Samsung LED HDTVs and am impressed with their quality.

Reviews.Title: nice kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Xcentric-1
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the kitchen. I mounted this under cabinet with a fixture and my wife and I find it very nice to have in the kitchen when we don't want to miss a show.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: MG
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased this tv for my bedroom & I really like it. Has a great picture. The settings take a little time to figure out but not that complicated.If you're interested in the alarm feature (like I was), you need to know that it does not work right with HD cable channels. The tv will turn on to fuzz if the cable signal is connected through the cable box and it needs to be set up this way to get HD channels. If you have basic cable only with the cable signal connected to the back of the tv the alarm should turn onto to a basic tv channel. Took some time of going back & forth with customer service to finally figure this out. Back to an old fashioned alarm clock.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19"
Reviews.Author: Robert K Finch
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for a small room, beautiful clarity and color.  Would recommend Samsung products to everyone, including recommending purchase through Amazon, it's so easy.

Reviews.Title: perfect for a small room or office
Reviews.Author: BRIMAR "S E S | WORKS"
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for a small off fits perfect great sound clear picture, remote is clear and to the point colors are perfect no complaints....

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smokes!!!
Reviews.Author: Fredrick Hassut Jr.
Reviews.Content: Great HD picture and fantastic sound.  Highly recommend for a master bedroom.  I own five TV's and this one is the BEST!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, some drawbacks
Reviews.Author: L. Schochet
Reviews.Content: Generally good, but narrow viewing angle. Base unstable.  I would not recommend unless you can view from directly in front of set.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to program. The only problem is the base. I have to prop it up, to make it sit right.

Reviews.Title: Second Samsung We Now Own
Reviews.Author: ripper2
Reviews.Content: Have had a Samsung 1080 in our household for about 2-3 years and it has and continues to serve us well.  Good picture and I like the little tynphons of musical notes it plays when going on and off.

Reviews.Title: No favorite channel button on remote
Reviews.Author: seedyone
Reviews.Content: Have never seen this on any other brand tv.  It takes 5 steps to access favorite channels with the remote; or to switch back to entire channel list.  This is annoying since several hundred channels are available on my cable system.  Simple feature that is important to me.  Picture and sound are great; have no issue with that.

Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: 25KJ
Reviews.Content: I don’t care what everyone says, this is a good TV. Picture’s good, the sound is good and the price is good. What more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Samsung 29" Purchase
Reviews.Author: DAVID KRAKOWSKI
Reviews.Content: Wanted a larger screen for the bedroom as the 20" just was too small.  Purchased the Samsun unit, was delivered on-time, easy to install, color and contrast are just right and I don't have to squint to see the information when changing channels..

Reviews.Title: Samsubng is our goto TV
Reviews.Author: Janet Amaral
Reviews.Content: Our house is filled with several years of Samsung TV's.  They are sleek, the picture is crisp and the colors are amazing.  I love digital.  Their price point is very competitive and their products last.

Reviews.Title: Typically great Amazon service...
Reviews.Author: Tom "I am a 79 year old retired business man....
Reviews.Content: ...and typically great Samsung quality and performance.  No, I didn't get paid to say that. :)  Installed the TV as a monitor on a new build computer setup and it works just like I had hoped.  Beats the price of a similar size monitor all to pieces and at that size and viewing distance the dpi make little difference, unless you are one of those "picky" users.  Very satisfied, in case you can't tell.

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: Lisa Z
Reviews.Content: Good picture and good sound. I'm not used to having no controls besides the on/off button on the TV itself but can adapt.

Reviews.Title: I really like the TV a lot except for the speakers (Sound) ...
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV a lot except for the speakers (Sound)  has a lot to be desired. Needs more bass.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful And Frugal.
Reviews.Author: arthurstone
Reviews.Content: This is quite a nice TV. It replaces my trusty Sony stereo 13". My monthly electric bill has gone down by $35 due to this replacement. It was a good move and this is a truly beautiful picture with nice stereo sound. I have cable TV and the 720P works great. 1080P might be nicer on paper, but with TVs of this size there would probably be little improvement. Sports will be fine with at 60HZ. March madness was beautiful.I have read reports of unsteady stands. You just have to tighten the screws down until they won't turn any more. Pretend that they are self tapping screws and everything will be fine. I would buy another one and if I get to the place where a larger TV would be needed I will buy another Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Thank you!
Reviews.Author: cheryl
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful t.v. I only wanted it for my husband's man-cave and it fits perfectly over his desk. It has great clarity!! He's happy so I'm happy!!

Reviews.Title: 19" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Lee
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes this 19" TV small and compact.  This is just the right size for a guestroom, not overbearing!  Sounds great.  I am looking into their next size for my other room.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my professional driver husband
Reviews.Author: dinsy53
Reviews.Content: My husband needed a very specific size television to fit on the already installed wall mount in his sleeper cab.  This one fit to a tee, and he is now a very happy professional driver, which makes the roads safer for all of us.  He loves being able to watch TV when he is on his breaks, and he is very happy with the quality of this television.  Of course he misses his 60" at home, but it makes him more appreciative of it when he has his home breaks!!  :D

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Mimai Taima
Reviews.Content: great price for its size. just the right size for my little girl's room. clear and colorful pictures. good product.

Reviews.Title: my tv
Reviews.Author: dorothy
Reviews.Content: i love my tv work good.nice pic.going to get one move later.this was for my living room for me, its a good one

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Jim Neely "Jim Neely - Nature Photography"
Reviews.Content: Good picture and easy to set up.  The stand needs to be screwed into the base of the TV to keep it level.  There was a complaint about no off/on switch.  It is on the back.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the money!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Kessel
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Beautiful crisp clear picture. Would recommend. May purchase a second one in the near future. This one is a winner.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jerry F. McCarty
Reviews.Content: Good size for use in Kitchen/dining area. Great picture quality and sound. Easy to install and operate with Direct TV receiver.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19 inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ananth N. Pai
Reviews.Content: Poor picture quality! It is difficult to adjust the picture. I made multiple attempts to adjust it but still the picture becomes dark.

Reviews.Title: If a small screen is what you need this TV fits the bill.
Reviews.Author: Jim Wallace
Reviews.Content: I needed a small TV in a bedroom and this did the job both size wise and price wise.Even though it was very inexpensive the picture quality was fine. Since it is postedon a wall the Magic Screen made seeing it very easily.

Reviews.Title: kitchen tv
Reviews.Author: pjs
Reviews.Content: This makes a great tv for the kitchen.  base is solid, no wiggle, has sound level control, tilt angle viewing.  Just a real good tv.  Their 22 inch model is probably a good choice as well.

Reviews.Title: TV suits my needs
Reviews.Author: P. Hart
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice little TV.  Needed something for my office that would fit in a small space.  Good quality, but I agree the stand could be more substantial.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Clif Freedman
Reviews.Content: This was a great TV...sound quality and viewing was perfect!  Reveiws from past purchasers were key to my buying FOUR of them for my vacation rental property on Martha's Vineyard.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Geri Rogers
Reviews.Content: This t.v. went into a spare bedroom, the picture is so clear and the sound is great.  I like Samsung products,,

Reviews.Title: Review on 19" Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Debra Matye
Reviews.Content: We wanted a small TV that would fit under our kitchen cupboards. The only complaint I have is the sound is not real great. Works great and fits under the cupboards.

Reviews.Title: My kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: R. Jonsson
Reviews.Content: I got this TV to fit on a counter in my kitchen. Its a perfect size for this. Great picture too!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Nancy M Hahn
Reviews.Content: Out of the box and on the stand in an easy 10 minutes. Beautiful picture and easy to operate. It basically programs itself and you have LITTLE to do on setup. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent small TV
Reviews.Author: nisquire
Reviews.Content: TV is excellent, its only limitation is that highest volume level is not very loud.  This would be an issue for some buyers but it isn't for me, as TV is used in kitchen.

Reviews.Title: issues
Reviews.Author: Sarah Proffitt
Reviews.Content: Didnt receivce the screws for the base. called asked to have them sent to me and that still.hasn't happened. very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for bed room.
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hawkins
Reviews.Content: For a small tv for my bedroom it's perfect.  The picture quality and sound is great no sound bar needed.

Reviews.Title: Shouldn't have waited so long to get one
Reviews.Author: Morganalee
Reviews.Content: I (like my mom) still had only the dinosaurs with the stick-out backs.  Didn't need any new TVs, I said, especially since I'd given up cable due to the absurd overpricing and lousy programming.  But this set is so light, so easy and "friendly" to set up, and it works perfectly with the indoor antenna I bought at the same time, so that I'm getting more than fifty assorted channels the old-fashioned way:  for free.  Plus, the screen's plenty big for me, just the right size to move about and fit in any space.  I'm quite pleased.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Randall B. Smith
Reviews.Content: A little smaller and not quite the quality I wanted, but you cant beat the price, and all in all, I would buy it agin! Contrary to other reviews there is a on of button on the back of the TV it is also a multi function and aside from changing the volume and channel it can do almost every thing that the actual remote can do from changing the source to changing the brightness.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Size for Me
Reviews.Author: Freda "student artist"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  With limited space and not being a TV addict, this television is fine.  My other set of 30 years had started making electrical short sounds and I needed a good replacement.  The color and clarity are beautiful and I understand that it can have a computer hookup, but have not ventured there at this time.

Reviews.Title: used very good
Reviews.Author: stanleyknapp
Reviews.Content: It is very good just the right size for my room purchase perfect sounds perfect I'm getting good use out of it thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: QBN
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my purchase.  The TV is exactly the size I had been looking for due to my limited space.  And the picture is just gorgeous, colors exceptionally vivid, over and above what I had expected.  A light weight monitor, literally plug and play to my DirecTV sat box, and voila! gorgeous picture!  And Amazon's price can not be beat by anyone out there, whether an online retailer or a brick and mortar store - are you listening BestBuy?  Or should we call you WorstBuy?

Reviews.Title: Perfect Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Great for being able to watch some Netflix in bed. Picture isn't the best, but it's not as bad as I've seen on other inexpensive TVs.
