Some decent settings to adjust the brightness, color, etc... Sound is pretty good. Overall it's an great, inexpensive small TV. Don't expect it to blow you away with cinema-quality performance.

Reviews.Title: Small TV for kitchn
Reviews.Author: Glo
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the picturebut the sound quality is pretty bad. I decided to kep it but they could surelydo better with the sound

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Vicky Cline
Reviews.Content: For a small tv it was the right size for the kids play room. It was mailed promptly and was just what I had expected for a small TV.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: MarieEAPz
Reviews.Content: I bought this small tv for my bedroom, it was easy to put together & I love the quality of the picture, the sound isn't all that great, but for the price it's a nice little tv & perfect for what I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture and Good Sound
Reviews.Author: Lydia S. Salmon
Reviews.Content: So far (about a month) this TV has given excellent performance with no problems.  Assembling the stand was quite easy.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat this little tv for the price
Reviews.Author: L. Holcomb "book geek"
Reviews.Content: Delivery time amazing ordered 3/18/14 got here 3/20/14, that is with regular shipping. It is exactly what I needed for my bedroom. I had a 10 year old 15" in there, and when my cable company went all digital had to get a new tv. Very easy to put stand on, and I am an older woman. Great color and sound, perfect for what I wanted it for. Samsung is a very good brand.  Would certainly recommend to anyone who needs a smaller tv, for kid's room, kitchen, or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV for tight spot.
Reviews.Author: Norway Bob "Norway Bob"
Reviews.Content: This TV was just the right size for a cabinet in the kitchen.  We like most of the features, but the sound needed made a little better.  Put computer speakers in the audio out jack and have better sound depth.

Reviews.Title: Not very happy
Reviews.Author: 8Bear's
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and thought I would be happy with this purchase. The reality is that the sound quality is very poor. The visual aspect is okay.I purchased this for my son's video gaming, so it serves it purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Chrissy
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time and was what I was expecting to receive. I'm pleased with the purchase and would order it again. The first one came with a crack in the screen. The exchange process was really quick and easy. I wasn't charged any additional fees and the next one came in perfect condition

Reviews.Title: Prettiest Picture I have ever seen
Reviews.Author: Cindy Ooten
Reviews.Content: This Samsung has a fantastic picture!  The remote is clearly marked and incredibly easy to operate.  Set up time was nominal.  If you are looking for a 29" television, shop no more.  This Samsung lives up to their name and quality

Reviews.Title: Highly recomended
Reviews.Author: howieh
Reviews.Content: This TV has a very nice picture for the price. Just the right size to be near my PC desk. The only thing I would have liked is the headphone jack on the front of the TV instead of in the back.

Reviews.Title: Small TV
Reviews.Author: Mims
Reviews.Content: This TV is the perfect size I needed to go into a small space on my kitchen counter.  Color is great as well as sound.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I am using this set for my security camera and it does a great job and clear pictures of what is going on outside around my home.

Reviews.Title: Good for RV
Reviews.Author: Larry007
Reviews.Content: plugged it in at a campground and watched the Olympics on it.  A very good tv for the price. Mounted it on wall of RV.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: LP
Reviews.Content: Just great.  I was looking for a small TV to put underneath my cabints in my kitchen and this was the perfect fit.  Good picture also.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the bedroom. Picture is clear & Bright does not take up alot of space. HDMI hook works perfect with my DVD Player

Reviews.Title: nice size
Reviews.Author: country girl
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my old 12" tv for my kitchen counter.  I chose Samsung since we had purchased a 42" one for our living room 3 years ago and were very satisfied with that purchase.  This tv is a nice size, perfect for the space I keep the kitchen tv in.  My only complaint is that the sound is very "tinny".  I plan to look and see if there is a place to hook up a pair of small speakers to to help fix that problem.  Other than that I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Rating on Samsung UN19F4000
Reviews.Author: Ryan Allen
Reviews.Content: It has good resolution, and even though 19" seems a little small for a tv, it works out perfectly if you live in a small dorm.

Reviews.Title: I am satisfied
Reviews.Author: Patrick Cunningham
Reviews.Content: I actually use It as a big screen for my computer.  So far it seems fine I have connected it with a video cable and quality of picture is very good.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Andrew "Andrew"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, price and TV. Very light and perfect for a wall mounted TV in a limited space area. Ours is in the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: so far the tv is great
Reviews.Author: P. English
Reviews.Content: still getting used to the channel numbers using the built-in digital tuner. 123-4 still seems a strange number for CBS

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Donna Dauenhauer
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for my older daughter whose TV just quit on her. This TV came on time, and in perfect condition! It was easy to set up, and the picture is great! Perfect size for her room, and easy to move if needed!

Reviews.Title: Great Kitchen or Bathroom TV
Reviews.Author: Roger J. Stricker
Reviews.Content: I needed a tv for the kitchen while I cook.  This works really well.  The picture quality is very good for such a small tv.  Good for watching cooking shows or just multi tasking while emptying out the dishwasher.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Joyce P. Howland "Joyce"
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice inexpensive television.  The picture quality is good and it was easy to set up and run.

Reviews.Title: Who makes a great little TV for the kitchen any more?  Good question; here's a good answer.
Reviews.Author: Benito Cellini "economist"
Reviews.Content: We have just  a little space on a countertop bar for a TV to watch from the kitchen table.  Had an old  Toshiba 15" but that was just too tiny.  This is great TV with more features that you're like to need, like a USB port.  Had trouble getting the stand on tight until I used an electric screwdriver with a long philips bit.  Otherwise it's great.

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV for the kitchen area
Reviews.Author: D. Ritter "Danny Joe"
Reviews.Content: I know I could have purchased a cheaper 19" television set for our kitchen but we have a 46" Samsung for our main set and love it.  The purchase was also based on third party ratings of small sets.  It was very easy to attach the base and the set was hooked up to an outside antenna which runs though an amplifier.  We are picking up over 30 channels with this set and it was very easy to scan in the channels.Remote was easy to use and similar to the one we have for the larger set.  It has some nice features we were not expecting and we especially like the "Channel List" which displays the channels programmed into the set and what show is currently on.Would highly recommend this set for kitchen, dorm, office, etc. where ever there is limited space.

Reviews.Title: Terrific TV
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: We needed a small tv for a hobby room. Space was an issue. Really easy setup and great support from Samsung customer service if you have a question. Excellent picture quality and good sound for a small set. Really happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Good kitchen television
Reviews.Author: Gerry
Reviews.Content: We like this Samsung kitchen tv.  It has a sharp picture and can be viewed from all angles.  The stand was a little tricky as we had to really work to get the screws through the first layer of plastic. We had been alerted to this by a review that stated that the stand was rickety and they had to use a book to hold it in place. We have a nice form stand.

Reviews.Title: A bargain.
Reviews.Author: Karl L. Wuensch "Dr  Psychostat"
Reviews.Content: Replaced an old cathode ray tube TV in the kitchen with this one.  Setup was very easy, and the picture is good for a small set.  There is something unusual about the audio, but I cannot put my finger on it, and that does not detract from our enjoyment of the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've been very happy with this TV.  The picture quality is good and the various cable connections easy to get to.  The sound quality, for a small TV, is also good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Senior Swede
Reviews.Content: We got this to replace a slightly smaller kitchen TV.  This unit is great viewing off axis and is much brighter.  It is connected to an over the air antenna and picks up 36 channels that are sharper and more colorful than the cable company.

Reviews.Title: work beautiffully
Reviews.Author: Jim Heid
Reviews.Content: While putting it up I dropped it twice, and a few pixels were scratched away.  But the tv works great, so that is a testament to Samsung.  The channel scan is quick and the USB port plays photos, music and lots of video formats.  Would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: Loving my tv
Reviews.Author: Regina
Reviews.Content: Wanted to upgrade the tv in my bedroom. This replaced my bulky tv, and having the hdmi plug in is great, since I was able to later get google chromecast to stream videos from my devices.

Reviews.Title: A good buy.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: This Samsung flat screen television works well and has good picture quality. The audio speakers, as may be expected, are incapable of good sound.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: McGee
Reviews.Content: It's a nice TV. My only complaint is that the stand is cheap plastic and when screwing in to the TV it went on a slant. I wish the stand would fit better and be easier to install.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: XRing "XRing"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my elderly sister-in-law. She loves it. It's the prefect size for her kitchen table.I pre-tested it before Christmas, and found the picture and functions worked great.I own two older Samsung LCD TVs models (not as thin and lightweight) in the same size range, that are also excellent TVs.The only negative so far, she had a hard time getting the base plate screws tight.(Not sure if she has a good #2 Phillips) I'll tweak them in, when we visit in the spring.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Den
Reviews.Content: After watching our main TV, an HD Plasma, I was not happy with the picture at first, couldn't adjust it for watching hockey it appeared "grainy". A week later I changed my whole house over to HD with Direct TV genie. What a difference......... Now both football and hockey are acceptable pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for the big box.
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Farabaugh
Reviews.Content: Great television. Sound quality required a sound bar addition. Great price. Terrific picture quality. So much easier than the old big box

Reviews.Title: Sweet Little TV
Reviews.Author: Pamela S
Reviews.Content: Great little TV. Nice picture. Stable on the kitchen counter. Easy to set up. I replaced a small old TV with it, and now my kitchen looks more neat and orderly.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Tom K.
Reviews.Content: I needed a tv for a guest room and like the size. Picture actually looks biger than I expected. Has a sharp pic. Iwould recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for price
Reviews.Author: elsobgirl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because of the brand and price. I was hesitant because everyone who had a review for this TV mentioned that the base was not good and if not installed properly the TV wobbled. I did not have this problem. Sound is good and the picture is bright. It is small  but it's appropriate for a bedroom. I do not need to have a movie screen in there, it does not hog up space and it's big enough to watch news and watch a movie when in the mood.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn Cowherd
Reviews.Content: The sound is excellent for bedroom. Had difficulty placing the stand on the T.V ( needs 2 people hold it)

Reviews.Title: Samsung......
Reviews.Author: Songbird
Reviews.Content: Love my new TV and it's features, especially the "magic angle"!  Great picture!  I know there are other features I'll learn about in time.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19F4000 19-Inch 720p 60Hz Slim LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: nili twersky
Reviews.Content: works fine, color good, it's in the kitchen, size is fine, picture streches to the sides but it doesn't disturb me

Reviews.Title: Less than perfect, but overall, we like it
Reviews.Author: Allan F. Damp "Frank D"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV to replace a clunky old CRT set in the kitchen which took up way too much counter space. It's not perfect and the instruction manual is near useless. We're finding out the various adjustments by trial and error. Our main complaint is "tinny" sound.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: plfox
Reviews.Content: extra tv in office area.  love the tilt feature as it sits on my rolltop.  perfect for my little hideaway space.  thank you

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for kitchen
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: this 19 inch TV is perfect for a kitchen.  it has good features, including adjustments for standing or sitting view. Good, clear color and picture.  I would recommend to  others.

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture, great TV.  A little trouble finding a compatible wall mount.
Reviews.Author: Price Tag
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our kitchen, to watch while cooking or sitting at the breakfast bar, and it's perfect.  The picture is sharp, and the sound is good.  Its is also much thinner than some of the other TVs of similar size, which is nice.  We did have some trouble finding a compatible wall mount - all fit the screw holes, but the first 2 mounts we tried were center mount (so we could extend and swivel), but covered the cable input.  We ended up having to get an "H" shaped wall mount.  That works for our application, but this TV may give you grief if you want it to be on a swivel wall mount.

Reviews.Title: fine TV and monitor, not so fine sound
Reviews.Author: tyro
Reviews.Content: Fine for use as an aux TV and it's a very good computer monitor. Using it with my Raspberry Pi. Sound could be a lot better though. That's why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Al Humbertson
Reviews.Content: It met our expectations.  Good picture, good sound.  Fits right into our kitchen.  If it Samsung it has to be good.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv 19"
Reviews.Author: kim l fry
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the bedroom very clear picture great sound.I'm very happy with this TV and it work great with my WD TV player

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19-inch TV
Reviews.Author: John Welter
Reviews.Content: This is the first Samsung TV I've owned and it's maybe the best TV I've had, as well as being reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Great Small TV
Reviews.Author: Harold Anderson
Reviews.Content: Just the perfect size for my office. Volume is great ,picture quality is good too. Did'nt even know it had RCA jacks behind and more. I mite even buy another one for viewing my security cameras  in my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Serves a Purpose
Reviews.Author: Nancy Behan
Reviews.Content: The TV serves a purpose as a second television, and quite possibly as a second computer monitor in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good quality; great price.
Reviews.Author: C. Glover "Good Life"
Reviews.Content: Good, clear picture quality.  Incredible price for a television to be used in a smaller room. A recommended purchase for those on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: princess
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and keep running, good quality picture. Proper size to small bedroom. Able to play media. Price was right too. Delivery  was on time

Reviews.Title: hard to find size at great price
Reviews.Author: underdoggy "underdog"
Reviews.Content: this tv fit into our corner cabinet where a 32" would not and it has great picture. my house is all samsung tv's now

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Holly V
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV.  It is a wide screen TV so not very tall.  It has a good picture.

Reviews.Title: Buy this and be happy.
Reviews.Author: sharon
Reviews.Content: Great TV for my kitchen.  Ready to go out of the package,  Good picture and sound .This is my second Samsung and they are both excellent

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Eddie from Flushing "Eddie from Flushing"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, very easy to set up and good for small (or tight spaces).  If you don't have the space for a larger HDTV, the one will fill the bill.

Reviews.Title: A good, compact t.v.
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Good overall.  Good picture.  Disappointed that I could not use it on a wall-mount that I bought for it, b/c the 'butterfly' shaped panel on the mount covered the component jacks.  (I was not using the HDMI).  Also, the sound quality is not as good as the sound on my old CRT t.v.

Reviews.Title: Practical
Reviews.Author: Bibliophile in disguise "petted"
Reviews.Content: When you have good signal, the images are sharp and for everyone complaining about the base - I have one question. Is the wide portion of the base facing the viewer or the wall? Mine is facing the viewer & I had no problems screwing in the base; that is it is structurally sound. I haven't tested the hdmi or USB features yet  so if I experience anything of note I'll update it and if not I won't.

Reviews.Title: greatr TV
Reviews.Author: Bonnie J. Blackington "nana"
Reviews.Content: the picture is great very sharp  almost like you were there  very easy to set up I just love it and so will you

Reviews.Title: All around good quality.
Reviews.Author: Mary QuiteContrary "IowaMama"
Reviews.Content: No complaints other than I cussed a little to get the stand attached to the screen.  Good sound.  All around good quality.

Reviews.Title: Compact TV Perfect for our Kitchen
Reviews.Author: amphillipsa "new mom"
Reviews.Content: This has been a good purchase. It might be just slightly smaller than I imagined (or had hoped) but it's a good size for our kitchen to sit on the counter under overhead cabinets.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Alaska's "Polarjoy"
Reviews.Content: The picture is excellent and it was easy to install on the wall with an articulating mount, bought separately.  It would get another star if the sound was better.  As with all small TV's, it's not as crisp as the larger ones.

Reviews.Title: Samsung products rock
Reviews.Author: John Douthwaite
Reviews.Content: Low voltage, clear picture - just what I was looking for.  Perfect TV for the spare bedroom.  Thanks Samsung for an other great product.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Cole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this August 22, 2013. I also bought the 2 year warranty to go with it. It died a little over a month ago. When I emailed amazon and the warranty company. BEWARE...Amazon returned an email saying it was too late to return it. The warranty company informed me that they were discussing it and would let me know when they made a decision. Before it died the picture and sound were perfect but with no warning, it just had no power. Any suggestions on what to do would be appreciated

Reviews.Title: Come with a worthless little stand
Reviews.Author: cyberrat
Reviews.Content: the stand that comes with the tv is a cheap plastic and it hard to connect to the tv.  nice little tv though but due to the stand I give this a two star because the stand is a pretty important part

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and excellent contrast.
Reviews.Author: hc "h"
Reviews.Content: By far the best picture overall I have ever seen in a small counter top HD LED TV.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Lower-end Samsung?
Reviews.Author: T.S.
Reviews.Content: GOOD -  Sound is good, even though not front-facing.  Accepts wide range of file types.  Picture amazing (upconverts?). Much better than the Vizio and LG's we tried.BAD -  Kicks you out of movie you're watching if you have to access the menu. REALLY ANNOYING. Not at all like the 42" Samsung we have in the living room.

Reviews.Title: Odd 29" Size sold me, performance to price - Made me write review!
Reviews.Author: VQT
Reviews.Content: I needed to mount a slim LED in my bedroom but the wall between 2 windows where I want it wouldn't accommodate a 32" TV.This odd 29" size fit perfectly in the spot.  You can't imagine how difficult it was to find an odd ball size like this but beyond the size, Samsung's LED quality & reputation sold me on this set.The picture is as expected for a light duty, bedroom LED - which is to say, it's teflon, & crisp but not life like like a plasma.But as it used mostly for falling to sleep to & about 30-45 minutes a day, the sizing & price is what really makes this set a winner in my eyes.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: jimmylegs "jimmylegs"
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and I think the sound is incredible for such a small TV.  I have 2 other larger Samsung LED's and the sound on this blows the other TV away.  Remote is simple and effective.  Easy purchase to make and the quality is as-expected from Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Not happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Himmie Mom
Reviews.Content: 19" TVs are far and few between, so I was sort of stuck with this.  Samsung may have improved the stand (no problems with this -- nice and steady), picture quality is fair, but the sound is truly dreadful -- tinney, echo-ey and so bad it's really irritating to listen to.  However, per another reviewer, I purchased small speakers and a wall charger -- and the sound is now acceptable.  Both purchased on Amazon:  HP 630797-001 Speakers - HP LCD speakers ($13.99)  and PowerGen White 2.4-Amp (12 Watt) Dual USB Wall Charger w/Sviwal Plug Designed for Apple and Android Devices ($10.00).  The LG 24" at around the same price had excellent sound and picture, but too large for my needs.  Not happy I had to purchase additional speakers, etc., to make this a usable product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Has Fallen!
Reviews.Author: James Merritt
Reviews.Content: Purchased the 19 inch LED T.V. (UN19F4000) for the kitchen.  Initially very pleased with the product, then the power cut-out without warning and progressed to NO POWER AT ALL.  This product has a defective MOTHERBOARD which means my purchase is nothing but TRASH CAN BAIT!  BUYER BEWARE...

Reviews.Title: Good moniter
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: I use this as an extra laptop dual monitor. It is not as clear as the one on my laptop but it is adequate. I lost the remote and I do not know how to turn it off. It powers off by itself from lack of use,

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and sound for a small TV
Reviews.Author: GardenGirl
Reviews.Content: This TV exceeded my expectations by a long shot. The picture is exceptional, there's a dizzying array of set-up option for every convenience imaginable, and it has great sound, not the hollow toy-box sound I expected from a little TV.This is being used as a wall-mounted bedroom TV and it's perfect for that. My only problem is reception since I use an antennae. The old analog TV (with converter box) that I replaced with this TV got many more channels than this gets. The 32" flat screen in the living room gets all those channels so there must be a way to get them on this TV. With limited knowledge of electronics I can only guess that the receiver this TV has is not as powerful as the analog converter box? - or something? I plan to tinker with a booster or maybe new antennae cable to see if I can get those channels again.If anyone more experienced than me has advise I would be ever so grateful.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a small room
Reviews.Author: Michael Collins
Reviews.Content: Love this little TV. I received it for free as part of a promo when I purchased their flagship 51 inch top of the line Plasma TV. That being said, it can't compare to that one and it shouldn't be. I threw this TV into a den until we get a larger TV in there, then this will move to a bedroom. I am impressed with the picture quality and especially the speakers. For under $300 in a small room this TV works great.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase.
Reviews.Author: MNMom
Reviews.Content: I am the type of person who is using this TV as a monitor for my computer. I dual monitor for mine. The colors on this TV are beautiful, crisp and clear. I actually have it next to a regular computer monitor and prefer looking to the TV than the monitor, so much so that I intend to spend the money to get a second one as soon as I can afford it.Set up was fairly easy, the biggest con of this TV is it's another flat panel TV that seems to think the best way to screw the stand in is to put the screw holes down a cylindrical tunnel that you are supposed to magically guide the screws in-easiest with a magnetic screwdriver.Overall, I feel it was a decent purchase. To my knowledge it's not any better or worse than any other TV but I trust the Samsung brand.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: mechele t
Reviews.Content: My mother is very pleased with her gift I've purchased for her.  The setup process of the television was simple, she says.  I'd like to say thank you for everything.  I'll be back for more...

Reviews.Title: Another nice Samsung product.
Reviews.Author: MW "optional"
Reviews.Content: Nice high quality TV with plenty of inputs.  Samsung as usual is one of the leaders when it comes to television

Reviews.Title: great little tv
Reviews.Author: scottie girl
Reviews.Content: great little tv for kitchen use it for under cabinet. also comes in clear when viewing from a side angles. i would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen
Reviews.Author: mcoliver
Reviews.Content: Mounted it on an arm in the kitchen so my girl can watch Jeopardy while she cooks.  fits under the cabinet and has a DC power supply that I velcroed to the back so that it swings with the TV.  This TV has DUAL HDMI inputs as opposed to many of the reviews online that state it only has 1.  Also has a coax that I hook into my HDTV OTA antenna on the roof to pull in 130+ digital channels for free.Please note that the VESA 75 mounting holes are near the top of the TV which means you need to allow for an extra few inches of room with most hinge mounts.  I did not have enough on my countertop so I opted for a horizontal arm style mount.

Reviews.Title: Whats not to like
Reviews.Author: Paul R. Steel "pabloinla"
Reviews.Content: I am so impresed with Samsung, this is my second small TV from them.CONS Does not automatically adjust to the screen size input. There is a manual control which works fine, but needs setting.

Reviews.Title: Best set I've ever had
Reviews.Author: J Martin
Reviews.Content: It has a wonderful clear non-reflective screen. Easy to install and use. Great price, too.Recommend for perfect small screen viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great Set
Reviews.Author: Donald E Hoke
Reviews.Content: I needed a small set to fit under the cabinets on the kitchen counter. The Samsung UN19F4000 met the dimensional requirement. The setup was simple and the picture quality is excellent. I would recommend this set.

Reviews.Title: Sharp image
Reviews.Author: Horacio S Falciglia
Reviews.Content: Excellent sharp crisp video excellent sound easy to install I will recommend it it s a great TV set thanks

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: george smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for are camper it's great nice picture and sound . For the price and quality you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV.
Reviews.Author: Yusuke Nakamura
Reviews.Content: It's not too big, but not too small. This size is good to put on my desk. Picture and sound quality is very good, yet the price is cheap.But be careful, you need to have a middle-size(I mean easy to grip) Phillips-head screw driver. You need this one to attach a TV stand and a TV display.I recommend this TV to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV
Reviews.Author: F. Morales "Ink"
Reviews.Content: It fits perfect in our master bath.Perfect size for a small space, very light and I was able to get a lot of HD channels via air

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's just the right size for under a cabinet in the kitchen. Great picture, sound is good also, not great but good for the size and where it is.

Reviews.Title: Great small flat screen tv
Reviews.Author: Mom of 3 Boys
Reviews.Content: Perfect for our small bedroom - great picture and sound quality - very affordable & super-easy to set up and use!  Highly-recommend it for small spaces!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Paula Sturgis
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality. A bit pricey for such a small screen.Very happy with product overall.Recommended for bedroom use or for gaming.

Reviews.Title: Nice compact tv with a great picture.
Reviews.Author: The Jersey Family
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to install in my master bathroom so I can watch the news in the morning when I am getting ready for work.  We were doing a bathroom remodel and decided this was the perfect time to install it on the wall.  Perfect size for what I needed.  Great picture and sound as well.

Reviews.Title: Great for What It Is
Reviews.Author: AR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television to replace a 15" flat screen in our kitchen that finally died after 7 years. I selected this model based on its Amazon reviews and cheap price and I'm pleased to say I'm very happy with it! It is certainly not something I would get for an entertainment center, but for some purpose like a kitchen counter, office or child's room it's a bargain.Setup is very simple. The automatic channel search took about 10-15 minutes to sort through the basic cable I have it hooked up to, but once complete the television is ready to go. Note that the factory default video and audio settings aren't stellar, the picture being a bit too bright and the audio somewhat muffled, but adjusting them in the menu setup selections cures both of those issues.Overall, considering what it is, I have nothing negative to say about this television and am glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19F4000
Reviews.Author: James E. Gustafson
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews that other reviewers had written, I purchased this Television. I found it to be what I had expected. There was one comment from some, that the Stand was a problem. The way the Stand attaches to the TV is not up to the standards that Samsung has used in the past, but has not been a problem. This Television is used in the Kitchen and is working out very well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Marta "Marta"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a TV that would fit on my kitchen counter since I spend so much time there.  This TV not only fits but has a larger screen than any other I have owned for this purpose.  The picture is outstanding and it has great features like adjusting the screen for viewing while standing up.  It is a brand new TV but an older model so the price was more than reasonable.  I feel like I really upgraded from my old clunky Sony.  Great choice.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The TV has an excellent picture is easy to use.  It is my 4th Samsung so I respect it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Victor Canas
Reviews.Content: very light, perfect for small spaces like kitchens or lounges, perfect for the nursery, the image quality excellent.100% recommended samsung product

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: John Cerruto
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected and more. Mounted perfectly and has a picture only expected from a Samsung product. I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Good quality TV for a small area
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Bought it for the kitchen area, didn't expect it to compare in quality with our larger tv sets so not disappointed at all. Not as sharp a picture as I would like, but much better than other 19" sets that I have seen.

Reviews.Title: TV - Samsung UN19F4000
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a TV I purchased for my art studio.  I like it very much.  It was easy to install, and is easy to operate. The sound, color and picture are all wonderful.

Reviews.Title: It is just ok
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: The picture is not perfect, sound is just ok.  The best thing is that the control does not have to be pointed directly at tv.

Reviews.Title: College Life
Reviews.Author: Kelly Terrell
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son in college to save him from trekking his 40" TV to school and have something happen to it. He loves it

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Lynn Helton
Reviews.Content: My Aunt is in a nursing facility and this helps her with keeping her entertained and the pice was very reasonable

Reviews.Title: Mediocre Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: William C. Gibson
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UN29F4000 TV is an older model and in my opinion over priced. The picture quality is just fair. I do not recommend this television.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Elaine Spiller
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture.  Easy to set up and enjoy.  Sound is somewhat tinny.  Have a sound bar on my 50" Samsung, which makes it an awesome TV.  However, this TV is too small for a sand bar, I'm told.  I have it in my bedroom, so don't want "computer" speakers, as I'd have to get out of bed each time to turn sound up or down.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 29" TV
Reviews.Author: william fox
Reviews.Content: This is my first step into the world of HD TV. I loved my 1997 JVC PIP 27"TV, until the sound finally went "distorted". I had purchased and built an entertainment center. It took me 14 hours to put together, with a 49 page book of instructions and 5lb. bag of nuts and bolts. I ran electric to it ect. My point is I was NO going to take it down or get rid of it just for a bigger TV> I was limited on the size of the TV I could fit, so I settled on this Consumer Report (I still get the magazine) rated 29" TV and am not only satisfied with it but I am extremely happy doing business with Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Bussard
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter loves it.  She now has her own tv so she can watch her favorite shows an not have to wait for others

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: Jerry J. Zepplin "zipzap"
Reviews.Content: Seems to be awful dark picture. I tried to do as the book said to lighten , but it is still very dark on some of the programs.It may just be those programs, but still should be able to veiw.

Reviews.Title: Color not too good
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Verhagen
Reviews.Content: The color on this TV is fair.  We tried adjusting, but could not get a brighter color.  We have this in our kitchen, so we don't watch it a lot, so the color is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: RV Bed Room TV
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: This TV fit the space for a it in our new 5th wheel trailer, have not used very much yet but it has a great picture and the sound is good. looking forward to enjoying in the very near future.

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture. Can see from all angles. Great sound too.
Reviews.Author: amawalkbw
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get this Samsung at such a low price. Picture quality is top notch and speaker volume is more than plenty. We are using it in the kitchen and can see it from all angles to no need to rotate the TV horizontally or vertically to get a clear picture.  Definitely a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Sally "Sally"
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for the bedroom. So easy to assemble (3 screws) that I was able to put it together myself. Also easy to program.

Reviews.Title: good tv, but the stand and remote control have issues
Reviews.Author: Darren Campo
Reviews.Content: Great TV at an amazing price.Fits under the kitchen counter perfectly.  The only reason I had to get a new one is because the old one couldn't unscramble the digital channels.  The cable co makes you rent a box (they give you one free for a year, then make you pay for it, but that's the sort of thing you forget about).This is easy to set up and works great.  Here are my only two issues:1. The stand is too short and wobbly.  Since most times I'm watching this TV I'm standing, it just looks like it's sitting too low on a kitchen counter.2. The remote has a tapered back, so if its just sitting on the counter and you push a button, it flips over.  You have to pick it up or have a gently touch, which is a pain when in the middle of cooking.

Reviews.Title: Great picture. Sound could be better.
Reviews.Author: Jabberama
Reviews.Content: We got this little TV for the kitchen, and I think it was a great buy. As with all  Samsung TVs, the picture is wonderful, clean, crisp, and colorful. It's also very easy to set up and use. However, the sound isn't so hot. It's tinny and sometimes rather faint. But it is fine for the purpose. And the price couldn't be better.P.S. This TV cannot be used as a computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Lovely picture, right price!
Reviews.Author: Mike Wingate
Reviews.Content: I was excited to install the tv in my kitchen and replace my old analog tv. The first thing I noticed was the clarity of the hd picture. Love it. Wish the mount was easier to install. I would suggest a pre-install of the mount?

Reviews.Title: I Think I Like IT
Reviews.Author: Margaret Savage
Reviews.Content: As yet, I haven't really had time to watch it much.  The platform support for the screen was hard to assemble and isn't straight on my desk.  I had to put a weight on the upper left corner of the screen to correct this.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Henry Boyle
Reviews.Content: I realy like the picture and sound. Recived it in a short while . I am sure it will give many years of service

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Donna Kelly
Reviews.Content: This is my kitchen TV. Keeps me company while I perform my chores!. Would recommend this TV to others. I am really enjoying it!

Reviews.Title: Quality picture
Reviews.Author: Handy Andy
Reviews.Content: This is a great replacement for our kitchen TV. The picture is very good for the size of the screen and the sound is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Christine Bell
Reviews.Content: I haven't watched tv in years. So when I decided to try it again it was with some trepidation. My Samsung TV got me thru the worst of it! It is beautiful. Captivating almost. Came within a few days of ordering, it was easy to set up and even easier to enjoy. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Got a Lemon
Reviews.Author: Diane Hamilton
Reviews.Content: My new tv did not work at all.  However I was able to get a real life tech person on the phone who led me through some double checking procedures before quickly determining that it was inoperable.  He told me I should send it back.  The return process also went quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Coffee Drinker
Reviews.Content: The Tv was exactly what I was looking for. I am using it in my kitchen.  It has good sound for a small set and a great picture.  Glad I bought it here, price was good.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: C. Brocato "cbrocman"
Reviews.Content: Very good price....free. Actually a nice tv for the lower end Samsung. Would recommend for small bed room or kitchen area

Reviews.Title: The TV is great and the price was good but needed local technical support.
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: The TV is great and the price was right; however the technical support did not get it working and I had to pay a local TV repair man to set it up ($75).

Reviews.Title: LED Screen Too Dark when placed on High Shelf
Reviews.Author: Jchic
Reviews.Content: This type of screen is not able to be viewed when placed on 6' high shelf.  Many adjustments were made with technical service staff  including manually tilting the screen downward and nothing worked.  It's frustrating to be limited to where you can place a tv in your home.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Maggie Nelson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my kitchen and it's just OK.  I've noticed that the picture and sound quality are not ideal, but it serves the purpose.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: T. JORGENSON "Pamphleteer"
Reviews.Content: Great unit, no drawbacks, THIN with a very good picture...it's a winner for the price.I do wish the remote had a light...I'd been happy to have paid another five bucks for a remote I could see in the dark.  Beyond that preference, no complaints, it's a greatvTV.

Reviews.Title: The miracle of miniturization
Reviews.Author: David D.
Reviews.Content: I'm old enough to remember when computers were huge machines, and TV screens were 60" wide or even larger!  Now through the miracle of miniaturization, you can get a great television set which measures only 19" across!!  I am delighted, but wonder if I had waited another year or so, could have gotten one even smaller.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Anderson "Jewels"
Reviews.Content: TV arrived very fast and problem free. Five minutes to unpack it and set it up. Excellent picture quality. We like it very much.

Reviews.Title: A very good value
Reviews.Author: Alexander A. DiSanti
Reviews.Content: The product is absolutely wonderful for what it is- a very good graphic and audio product.  I wish they offered it with a blue tooth component.

Reviews.Title: great size for Kitchen
Reviews.Author: Anetrod
Reviews.Content: Haven't had chance to hook it up yet but well pleased so far. Great expectations after reading the pros and cons.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: J. W. Rine
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Using this in our kitchen. Light weight. Mounted on an swiveling arm. Stand not used. Good sound and picture quality.

Reviews.Title: A good TV
Reviews.Author: KING CHEUNG
Reviews.Content: I like it very much, I can watch Local channels and someinternational channel too.I recommend some one to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Product is exceptional, but delivery carrier lacks professionalism!
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Nunnenkamp
Reviews.Content: This is a product Samsung can (and should) be very proud of.  I've found it be just the right size for the bedroom, not overwhelming the room, but with a picture that is clear and has an amazing color, including non-HD channels.The only thing that I was less than satisfied was the method of shipping and delivery.  Actually 100% of delivery, Fed-Ex did NOT even knock at the door, in fact they were so sneaky, I didn't even hear them place it on my porch and I was sitting 10-15 feet from the door. Now here's the problem, at approx. 3 pm I check my email, decided to check the package tacking and found my purchase had been delivered at 11:59am.  I urge you to change carriers to USPS, they at least ring the doorbell & knock, when no signature is available.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV but ...
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: The TV is outstanding.  The size is perfect for my kitchen countertop.  I decided not to mount it under the cabinets because the wires would be visible coming down the wall.  The picture is sharp and the color is sensational.  The sound is clear and easily adjustable.  The TV is outstanding for a kitchen or smaller room because of its size.  I would have given it 5 stars but the TV stand is unbelievably flimsy and cheap.  At first I thought I would not be able to use it but took a chance and it is still standing.  I would not recommend using the stand if there are children or active pets dashing about the room in close proximity to the TV.

Reviews.Title: Lousy TV stand
Reviews.Author: M. Viggiano
Reviews.Content: As many folks stated the TV stand is cheap, wobbly and not very well designed not a bad picture for a small screen

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Peter W. George "soyflakeman"
Reviews.Content: This is our first LED set and my wife likes it a lot but I have to say I'm less of a fan. It is nice and compact and I'm sure will last a long time but the picture seems to me to lack depth. If I look at a really good LCD or plasma picture it really feels like I am seeing the actual person or event and not just an image of same. With this TV I know I'm looking at an image and it just doesn't give me the same pleasure. I may get used to it but I'll watch my others for anything longer than a bowl of cereal.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv
Reviews.Author: P. Subramanian
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my granddaughter, so I assume she likes watching it. I do see her enjoying her programs on it.

Reviews.Title: Nice computer.  streamlined, No bulky modum--fits my office better
Reviews.Author: Diane A.
Reviews.Content: Nice slim computer--No bulky modem & I like the flat screen.  It fits in my office much better that my old computer.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV but Cheap Stand
Reviews.Author: J. Carson
Reviews.Content: Decent little TV but the shockingly the cheap plastic stand/base does not swivel or tilt up and down.  If you don't need it to tilt or swivel, I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth P. Caldwell
Reviews.Content: Needed a king size fitted sheet for a trip with family and this was quick and affordable.  Thank you very much

Reviews.Title: You Can Do Better
Reviews.Author: Patrick Moose
Reviews.Content: I needed a small TV for my office.  I have two other Samsung TVs which are larger.  They are great.  This 19-inch just doesn't measure up.  You get what you pay for, I guess.  This TV was only $154.  I wish I'd shopped around and found a better one.

Reviews.Title: TV for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Jerry Jones
Reviews.Content: Picture quality was not as good as the Panasonic and LG TV's purchased at the same time.  Speaker quality is not real good.  The angle of viewing with this product is very limited in comparison to the plasma produt.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PICTURE AND SOUND FOR A SMALL TV
Reviews.Author: MARGOT HALPERN
Reviews.Content: SO GLAD WE BOUGHT THIS  WE HAVE IT IN THE KITCHEN.  GREAT TO WATCH WHILE EATING.  ( KNOW THIS ISN'T HEALTHY, BUT WE DO IT ANYWAY.)

Reviews.Title: I hate doing a big long review
Reviews.Author: Michael E. James
Reviews.Content: The product is absolutley fine it does what it is supposed to do.It works just fine no problem every thig is fine.

Reviews.Title: works great love it works great love it works great love it works great love it works great love it works great love it works gr
Reviews.Author: ottisot

Reviews.Title: Not made for antenna use
Reviews.Author: Debbra L., Nagle
Reviews.Content: I bought this little TV to replace my old analog TV in the kitchen, which works by antenna only (no satellite or cable).  This TV would not pull in ANY local stations, so I am returning it.  A call to Samsung confirmed that these are really made for cable or satellite hookup.  I'm not sure any other flat-panel TV would be better, but for sure this one won't work for me.  Too bad - it looked like a nice set.

Reviews.Title: 19 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Jan Geig
Reviews.Content: It was too low for the spot we needed it for, so we ordered the 22 inch and it fit perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Flat screen for kitchen
Reviews.Author: Nancy Shade
Reviews.Content: Super TV and easy enough install. Perfect for the small kitchen use and my elderly mother is enjoying it. We mounted it on the wall to free up counter space. Was perfect and glad I ordered it on line.

Reviews.Title: wont order tv on line again
Reviews.Author: Merikay Dragon
Reviews.Content: I am not crazy about the picture quality and wish I had ordered a larger screen.I expected more from the reputation of Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture and cheap stand
Reviews.Author: Michael Nolan
Reviews.Content: The picture was just not very good, and the base of it wouldn't even click into the set properly. I was afraid of breaking it if I pushed too hard.

Reviews.Title: To be bought together with a scanning electron microscope
Reviews.Author: Ashok Ramu "engggradstudent"
Reviews.Content: The screen is too narrow. When I bought a Samsung LCD 19'' TV in 2009, I loved it so much that I kept it for four years. I thought this 19'' LED TV would have the same dimensions. The length was 19'' as claimed, but the width is not more than 10''. In short, it's a great laptop display.

Reviews.Title: to small
Reviews.Author: liljohn
Reviews.Content: I like it but it was to small for me I thought it was bigger. gave it to my lil girl so she can watch tv on it. nice picture hd

Reviews.Title: might be ok for certain situations
Reviews.Author: C2000
Reviews.Content: I got this for the headphone jack, but I really don't like the TV. It has no real cord. The cord has a somewhat bulky detachable AC adapter, which I don't like. The TV is too short like many LED TV's and not easily tilted downward toward my bed. Base is too small. Doesn't seem slim. Reception poor. The red light is on the right bottom side and not the center. I would never buy any Samsung TV for my bedroom ever again, unless it was the only headphone jack TV on the market.

Reviews.Title: Crappy TV
Reviews.Author: Brittney
Reviews.Content: It has already broken down and I have only had it for a few weeks. I thought Samsung's were good TVs.

Reviews.Title: Something missing, obviously
Reviews.Author: Lawrence R. Wright
Reviews.Content: Well, more to come later but, it's been a long time since I bought a small TV and apparently one thing not included these days is an even nominal antenna. So, until the one I ordered today shows up... no signal. No reason not to presume that it will perform fine after that.FOLLOW UP: After trying four different antennas, still cannot get decent reception and some local major channels not at all (we are perhaps 15 miles from the nation's capitol), when our other TV works fine. Alas, took too long and cannot return so now it's a doorstop.

Reviews.Title: 19inch TV
Reviews.Author: cara whipple
Reviews.Content: I thought I was getting atleast a 22 inch tv when I ordered and for the price I couldhave gone to the local walmart and bought much bigger.
